Uze ucele, kwaye izibhalo zam ziya kunikwa njengoko ndalathile, kwaye ziya kulondolozwa elukhuselekweni;
Kwaye kufanelekile okokuba nithi nibambe uxolo lwenu ngokunxulumene nabo, kwaye ningabafundisi kude kube nibamkele ngokupheleleyo.
Kwaye ndininika umyalelo wokuba ngoko niya kubafundisa bonke abantu; kuba baya kufundiswa kuzo zonke izizwe, izalamane, iilwimi nabantu.
Nize nithabathe izinto enithe nazamkela, ezithe zanikwa nina zibe ngumthetho okwizibhalo zam, zibe ngumthetho olawula ibandla lam;
Kwaye lowo wenza ngokunxulumene nezi zinto uya kusindiswa, kwaye lowo ungazenziyo uya kugwetywa ukuba uqhubeka njalo.
Ukuba uya kucela, uya kufumana isityhilelo phezu kwesityhilelo, ulwazi phezu kolwazi, ukuze abenokwazi iimfihlelo nezinto zoxolo—ezo zizisa uvuyo, olo luzisa ubomi obungunaphakade.
Nize nicele, kwaye kuya kutyhilwa kuni ngexesha lam elimisiweyo apho iYerusalem eNtsha iya kwakhiwa khona.
Kwaye qaphelani, kuya kwenzeka ukuba izicaka zam zibe ziya kuthunyelwa ngaphambili empumalanga nasentshonalanga, entla nasezantsi.
Kwaye nkqu ngoku, mvumeleni lowo uya ngasempumalanga abafundise abo baya kuguqulwa basabele entshonalanga, kwaye oku kungumphumela woko kuzayo emhlabeni, namayelenqe afihlakeleyo.
Qaphelani, niya kuqwalasela zonke ezi zinto, kwaye uya kuba mkhulu umvuzo wenu; kuba ninikwe ukwazi iimfihlelo zobukumkani, kodwa ihlabathi alikunikwanga ukuzazi zona.
Niya kuqwalasela imithetho eniyifumeneyo nize nithembeke.
Kwaye niya kufumana ukususela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo iminqophiso yebandla, enjengaleyo iya kwanela ekunimiseni, kunye apha nakwiYerusalem eNtsha.
Ke ngoko, lowo uswele ubulumko, makacele kum, kwaye ndiya kumnika ngokukhululekileyo ndingamngcikivi.
Phakamisani iintliziyo zenu nize nivuye, kuba bobenu ubukumkani, okanye ngamanye amazwi, izitshixo zebandla zinikelwe. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.
Ababingeleli nootitshala baya kufumana ubugosa babo, nkqu njengamalungu.

Kwaye abadala okanye ababingeleli abaphezulu abonyulelwe ukuncedisa ubhishophu njengabacebisi ezintweni zonke, bamele ukuxhaselwa iintsapho zabo ngokuvela kwisakhiwo neempahla ezingcwaliselwe kubhishophu, ngokulungele amahlwempu, nangezinye iinjongo, njengoko kukhankanyiwe ngaphambili;

Okanye bamele ukufumana umvuzo ofanelekileyo ngayo yonke imisebenzi yabo, mhlawumbi owobugosa okanye ongowolunye uhlobo, njengoko kuya kucingwa ukuba kokona kulungileyo okanye kugqitywe ngabacebisi nobhishophu.
Kwaye kanjalo, ubhishophu, uya kufumana inkxaso yakhe, okanye umvuzo ofanelekileyo ngayo yonke imisebenzi yakhe ebandleni.

Qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba nabaphina abantu phakathi kwenu, abathe babekela kude abalingane babo ngesizathu sombulo, okanye ngamanye amazwi, ukuba baya kunika ubungqina phambi kwenu kuko konke ukuthobeka kwentliziyo ukuba oku ngunobangela, anisayi kubaphosela ngaphandle phakathi kwenu;

Kodwa ukuba niya kufumanisa ukuba nabaphi na abantu abathe bashiya abalingane babo ngesizathu sokrexezo, kwaye bona iziqu zabo bangabonileyo, kwaye abalingane babo bayaphila, baya kuphoselwa ngaphandle phakathi kwenu.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndithi kuni, okokuba niya kuzigada nizilumkele, ninokubuza konke, kwaye ningamkeli namnye onjalo phakathi kwenu ukuba batshatile;
Kwaye ukuba abatshatanga, baya kuguquka ezonweni zabo zonke okanye aniyi kubamkela.
Kwaye kwakhona, wonke umntu ongoweli bandla likaKrestu, uya kuqwalasela ukugcina yonke imiyalelo neminqophiso yebandla.

Kwaye kuya kwenzeka, okokuba nabaphina abantu phakathi kwenu abaya kubulala baya kuziswa kwaye bohlwaywe ngokunxulumene nemithetho yelizwe; kuba khumbulani lowo ungenalo uxolo; kwaye kuya kubonakaliswa ngokunxulumene nemithetho yelizwe.

Kwaye ukuba nayiphi na indoda okanye umfazi uya kukrexeza, lowo uya kumiswa phambi kwabadala ababini bebandla, okanye abangaphezulu, kwaye ilizwi ngalinye liya kumiswa ngokuchasene naye ngamangqina amabini ebandla, kwaye ingabi ngawotshaba; kodwa ukuba kukho amangqina angaphezulu kwamabini kokona kungcono.

Kodwa lowo uya kugwetywa ngomlomo wamangqina amabini; kwaye abadala baya kubeka isimangalo phambi kwebandla, kwaye ibandla liya kuphakamisa izandla zalo ngokuchasene naye, ukuze abe nokohlwaywa ngokomthetho kaThixo.
Kwaye ukuba kunokwenzeka, kuyimfuneko ukuba ubhishophu kanjalo abekhona.
Kwaye kungoko niya kwenza njalo kuzo zonke izimangalo eziya kuza phambi kwenu.
Kwaye ukuba indoda okanye umfazi uya kuphanga, lowo uya kuziswa emthethweni welizwe.
Kwaye ukuba lowo uya kuba, lowo uya kuziswa emthethweni welizwe.
Kwaye ukuba lowo uya kuxoka, lowo uya kuziswa emthethweni welizwe.
Kwaye ukuba lowo wenza naluphina uhlobo lobugwenxa, lowo uya kuziswa emthethweni, nkqu kulowo kaThixo.
Kwaye ukuba umzalwana wakho okanye udade uyakukhathaza wena, uze umthabathe kube phakathi kwakhe nawe kuphela; kwaye ukuba uyazohlwaya niya kuxolelana.
Kwaye ukuba lowo akazohlwayi uya kumzisa abandleni, ingabi ngamalungu, kodwa ebadaleni. Kwaye kuya kwenziwa entlanganisweni, nokokuba kungabi phambi kwehlabathi.
Kwaye ukuba umzalwana wakho okanye udade ukhathaza abaninzi, lowo uya kululekwa phambi kwabaninzi.
Kwaye ukuba nabani na ukhathaza ngokuphandle, lowo uya kungxoliswa ngokuphandle, ukuze lowo abe neentloni. Kwaye ukuba lowo akazohlwayi, lowo uya kuziswa emthethweni kaThixo.

Ukuba othile uya kukhathaza emfihlakalweni, lowo uya kungxoliswa emfihlakalweni, ukuze lowo abe ufumana ithuba lokuzohlwaya emfihlakalweni kulowo ebethe wamkhathaza, nakuThixo, ukuze ibandla lingabi nokuthetha ngokungcikivayo ngaye.
Kwaye niya kulawula ngokunjalo ezintweni zonke.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 43
chapter_summary: 1–7, Izityhilelo nemiyalelo ziza kuphela ngolonyulo olunye kuphela; 8–14, AbaNgcwele bangcwaliswa ngokwenza okungcwele konke phambi kweNkosi; 15–22, Abadala bathunyelwa phambili ukumemeza inguquko nokulungiselela abantu umhla omkhulu weNkosi; 23–28, INkosi Ibiza abantu ngelizwi Layo ngamandla endalo; 29–35, IMileniyam nokubotshwa kukaSathana ziya kuza.

verses.text: Owu phulaphulani, nina badala bebandla lam, kwaye nikani indlebe emazwini endiya kuwathetha kuni.
Kuba qaphelani, inene, inene, ndithi kuni, okokuba namkele umyalelo womthetho ebandleni lam, ngaye lowo ndimnyulele nina ukuze amkele imiyalelo nezityhilelo ezivela esandleni sam.
Kwaye oku niya kukwazi ngokuqinisekileyo—ukuba akakho ongomnye owonyulelwe nina ekwamkeleni imiyalelo nezityhilelo ade abe uthathiwe, ukuba uhlala kum.

Kodwa inene, inene, ndithi kuni, okokuba akakho omnye oya kunyulelwa esi sipho ngaphandle kokuba kube kungaye; kuba ukuba sithe sathatyathwa kuye akayi kuba namandla ngaphandle kokuba wonyule omnye endaweni yakhe.
Kwaye oku kuya kuba ngumthetho kuni, wokokuba anamkeli imfundiso zakhe nabani na njengezityhilelo okanye imiyalelo oya kuza phambi kwenu;
Kwaye oku ndikunika nina okokuba nibe nokungakhohliswa, ukuze nibe nokwazi okokuba abangabo abam.

Kuba inene ndithi kuni, okokuba lowo umiselwe ndim uya kuza ngesango aze amiselwe njengoko ndinixeleleyo ngaphambili, ukufundisa ezo zityhilelo enizifumeneyo enithe nazamkela ngaye lowo ndimnyulileyo.

Kwaye ngoku, qaphelani, ndininika umyalelo, wokokuba xa nihlangene kunye niya kuyalela nize niphuculane, ukuze nibenokwazi ukuba ningasebenza nize nikhokele njani ibandla lam, ningasebenza njani kumanqaku omthetho nemiyalelo yam, endininikileyo.
Kwaye kungoko niya kuyalelwa emthethweni webandla lam, nize ningcwalise koko enithe nakufumana, kwaye niya kuzibophelela ekwenzeni kubo bonke ubungcwele phambi kwam—
Ukuze njengoko niya kwenza oku, ubuqaqawuli buya kongezwa ebukumkani enithe nabufumana. Kangangoko ningayi kukwenza oku, kuya kuthatyathwa, nkqu oko sele nikufumene.
Hlambulukani niphume ebugwenxeni obuphakathi kwenu; zingcwaliseni phambi kwam;
Kwaye ukuba ninqwenela ubuqaqawuli bobukumkani, nyulani isicaka sam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., nize nimxhase phambi kwam ngomthandazo wokholo.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndithi kuni, okokuba ninqwenela iimfihlelo zobukumkani, mboneleleni ngokutya nengubo, nangayo nayiphi na into ayifunayo ekuphumeleliseni umsebenzi lowo endimyalele wona;
Kwaye ukuba anikwenzi oku uya kuhlala kwabo bathe bamamkela, ukuze ndibe nokuzigcinela abantu abanyulu phambi kwam.

Kwakhona ndithi, phulaphulani nina badala bebandla lam, abo ndibonyulileyo: Anithunyelwanga ngaphambili ekubeni nifundiswe, kodwa ukufundisa abantwana babantu izinto endizibeke ezandleni zenu ngamandla oMoya wam;
Kwaye kufundiswa okuvela phezulu. Zingcwaliseni kwaye niya kuphiwa amandla, ukuze nibe nokunika nkqu njengoko ndithethileyo.
Phulaphulani nina, kuba, qaphelani, umhla omkhulu weNkosi ukufuphi.

Kuba umhla uyeza lowo iNkosi iya kuthetha ngelizwi layo eliphuma ezulwini; amazulu aya kunyikima nomhlaba uya kugungqa, kwaye ixilongo likaThixo liya kuvakala kunye, kude nakakhulu, kwaye liya kuthi kwizizwe ezileleyo: Nina bangcwele vukani nize niphile; nina boni hlalani nize nilale ndide ndibe ndiya kubiza kwakhona.
Ngako oko bhinqani izinqe zenu hleze nifunyanwe phakathi kwabakhohlakeleyo.
Phakamisani amazwi enu kwaye ningashiyeleli. Bizelani izizwe enguqukweni, kunye abadala nabancinane, kunye abasebukhobokeni nabakhululekileyo, nisithi: Zilungiseleleni umhla omkhulu weNkosi;

Kuba xa mna, ndingumntu, ndiphakamisa ilizwi lam ndize ndinibizele enguqukweni, kwaye nindithiye, niya kuthini xa umhla ufika xa iindudumo ziya kuvakalisa amazwi azo avela kwiziphelo zomhlaba zithetha ezindlebeni zabo bonke abaphilayo, zisithi—Guqukani, nize nilungiselele umhla omkhulu weNkosi?

Ewe, kwaye kwakhona, xa imibane iya kutshawuzela ngaphambili ukusuka empumalanga ukuya entshonalanga, kwaye iya kuvakalisela ngaphambili amazwi yawo kubo bonke abaphilayo, ize yenze iindlebe zabo bonke abamameleyo zintlontlozele, ithetha la mazwi—Guqukani nina, kuba umhla omkhulu weNkosi uyeza?
Kwaye kwakhona, iNkosi iya kuvakalisa ilizwi layo liphuma ezulwini, isithi: Phulaphulani, Owu nina zizwe zomhlaba, kwaye nimamele amazwi aloo Thixo wanenzayo.
Owu, nina zizwe zomhlaba, kukangaphi endithe ndabe ndihlanganise rhoqo kunye njengesikhukukazi sihlanganisele amantshontsho aso phantsi kwamaphiko aso, kodwa anivumanga!

Kungaphi endithe ndabe ndinibize rhoqo ngomlomo wezicaka zam, nangolungiselelo lweengelosi, nangelizwi lam, nangelizwi leendudumo, nangelizwi lemibane, nangelizwi leenkqwithela, nangelizwi leenyikima zomhlaba, neenkqwithela zesichotho ezinkulu, nangelizwi lendlala neentshabalalo zalo lonke uhlobo, nangesandi esikhulu sexilongo, nangelizwi lomgwebo, nangelizwi lenceba imini yonke, nangelizwi lozuko nembeko nobutyebi bobomi obungunaphakade, kwaye ngelanisindisayo ngosindiso lwanaphakade, kodwa anivumanga!
Qaphelani, umhla ufikile, xa indebe yomsindo wengqumbo yam izele.
Qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba la ngamazwi eNkosi uThixo wenu.
Ngako oko, sebenzani, sebenzani esidiliyeni sam ngexesha lokugqibela—kuba ixesha lokugqibela libiza abemi bomhlaba.
Kuba ngexesha lam elifanelekileyo ndiya kuza phezu komhlaba emgwebeni, kwaye abantu bam baya kukhululwa kwaye balawule nam emhlabeni.
Kuba iMileniyam enkulu, endithethe ngayo ngomlomo wezicaka zam, iya kuza.
Kuba uSathana uya kubotshelelwa, aze xa ekhululwa kwakhona uya kulawula kuphela ixesha elincinane, kuze ngoko kufike isiphelo somhlaba.
Kwaye lowo uhlala ebulungiseni uya kwenziwa ngakumbi ngephanyazo leliso, kwaye umhlaba uya kudlula njalo ngomlilo.

Kunye abakhohlakeleyo baya kujulelwa emlilweni ongacimiyo, kwaye isiphelo sabo akukho mntu usaziyo, kwaye isiphelo sabo akukho mntu usaziyo emhlabeni, singasayi kwaziwa, kude kube beza phambi kwam emgwebeni.
Phulaphulani nina la mazwi. Qaphelani, ndinguYesu Krestu, uMsindisi wehlabathi. Londolozani ezi zinto ezintliziyweni zenu, nize nenze iintsulungeko zanaphakade ziphumle phezu kweengqondo zenu.
Yibani neengcinga eziphilileyo. Gcinani yonke imiyalelo yam. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/44.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 44
chapter_summary: 1–3, Abadala bamele ukuhlangana enkomfeni; 4–6, Bamele ukulungiselela ngokunxulumene nemithetho yelizwe nokukhathalela amahlwempu.

verses.text: Qaphelani, itsho njalo iNkosi kuni zicaka zam, kufanelekile kum okokuba abadala bebandla lam babizwe kunye, ngeleta okanye ngenye indlela, ukususela empumalanga nokususela entshonalanga, nokususela entla nokususela ezantsi.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka, ukuba njengokuba beya kuthembeka, kwaye basebenzise ukholo kum, ndiya kubathululela uMoya wam phezu kwabo ngomhla abazihlanganise ngawo kunye.
Kwaye kuye kwenzeka okokuba baya kuya ngaphambili ezingingqini ezingqongileyo, baze bashumayele inguquko ebantwini bam.
Kwaye abaninzi baya kuguqulwa, njengokuba niya kufumana amandla okuzilungiselela iziqu zenu ngokunxulumene nemithetho yomntu;

Ukuze iintshaba zenu zingabi namandla phezu kwenu; ukuze nibe nokukhuselwa kuzo zonke izinto; ukuze nibe nako ukugcina imithetho yam; ukuze onke amakhamandela abe nokuqhawulwa apho utshaba lufuna ukutshabalalisa abantu bam.

Qaphelani, ndithi kuni, okokuba nimele ukuvelela amahlwempu nabasweleyo nize nilungiselele isiqabu sawo, ukuze babe nokugcinwa kude kube zonke izinto ziyenziwa ngokunxulumene nomthetho wam lowo nithe nawamkela. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/45.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 45
chapter_summary: 1–5, UKrestu ungumthetheleli wethu kunye noYise; 6–10, Ivangeli ngumthunywa ekulungiseni indlela phambi kweNkosi; 11–15, UEnoki nabazalwana bakhe bamkelelwe yiNkosi Kuyo; 16–23, UKrestu watyhila imiqondiso yokuza kwakhe njengoko inikiwe eNtabeni yeMinquma; 24–38, Ivangeli iya kubuyiselwa, amaxesha abeeNtlanga aya kuzalisekiswa, kwaye isigulo esidakumbisayo siya kugubungela ilizwe; 39–47, Imiqondiso, imimangaliso, noVuko ziya kukhapha ukuBuya kweSibini; 48–53, UKrestu uya kuma eNtabeni yeMinquma, kwaye amaYuda aya kuwabona amanxeba ezandleni Zakhe nasezinyaweni; 54–59, INkosi iya kulawula ngeMileniyam; 60–62, UMprofeti uyalelwa ukuqalisa uguqulelo lweTestamente eNtsha, ngolwazi olubalulekileyo oluya kwenziwa ukuba lwaziwe; 63–75, AbaNgcwele bayalelwa ukuba bahlanganisane baze bakhe iYerusalem eNtsha, abantu abavela kuzo zonke izizwe baya kuya kuyo.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu nina bantu bebandla lam, ubukumkani obunikelwe kubo; mamelani nina nize ninike indlebe kulowo ubeke isiseko somhlaba, owenze amazulu nazo zonke izihlwele zawo, kwaye ngaye zonke izinto eziphilayo zenziwa, zaza zashukuma, zaza zabakho.
Kwaye kwakhona ndithi, phulaphulani elizwini lam, hleze kube ukufa kuya kuniphangela; kulo ilixa xa ningacingi ukuba ihlobo liya kudlula, nokuvuna kuphelile, kwaye nemiphefumlo yenu ingasindiswanga.
Mamelani kuye ongumthetheleli kunye noYise, ocengela injongo yenu phambi kwakhe—
Esithi: Bawo, qaphela iimbandezelo nokufa kwakhe ongenasono, kuye wawukholiseke kakuhle; qaphela igazi lonyana wakho eliphalalayo, igazi lakhe owamnikelayo ukuze wena ubenokuzukiswa;
Ngako oko, Bawo, sindisa aba bazalwane bakholelwa egameni lam, ukuze babe nokuza kum baze babe nobomi obungunaphakade.
Phulaphulani, Owu nina bantu bebandla lam, kwaye nina badala mamelani kunye, nize nive ilizwi lam ngelixa libizayo namhlanje, nize ningazenzi lukhuni iintliziyo zenu;
Kuba inene ndithi kuni okokuba ndinguAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo, ukukhanya nobomi behlabathi—ukhanyiso lwabonakala ebumnyameni basuka ubumnyama abaluqiqa.

Ndeza kwabangabam, baza abangabam abandamkela; kodwa njengokuba bebaninzi abandamkelayo ndabanika amandla okwenza imimangaliso emininzi, baza bangoonyana bakaThixo; kwaye nkqu kwabo bakholelwayo egameni lam ndabanika amandla okuzuza ubomi obungunaphakade.

Kwaye nkqu kunjalo ndithumele umnqophiso wam wanaphakade ehlabathini, ube lukhanyiso ehlabathini, kwaye ube yibhanile yabantu bam, neyabeeNtlanga ekufuneni kuyo, kwaye ube ngumthunywa phambi kobuso bam ekulungiseni indlela phambi kwam.
Ngako oko, yizani nina kuwo, kwaye nalowo uzayo ndiya kuqiqa njengasebantwini kwimihla yakudala, kwaye ndiya kunibonisa ukuqiqa kwam okomeleleyo.
Ngako oko, mamelani nina kunye kwaye nindivumele ndinibonise nkqu obam ubulumko—bakhe enithi nina unguThixo kaEnoki, nabazalwana bakhe,

Abohlulwayo emhlabeni, baza bamkelelwa kum—isixeko esigciniweyo kude kube ngumhla oya kuza wobulungisa—umhla owafunwa ngabo bonke abantu abangcwele, kwaye abazange bawufumane ngenxa yenkohlakalo namasikizi;
Kwaye bavuma ukuba bangabasemzini neendwendwe emhlabeni;
Kodwa bazuza isithembiso sokuba baya kuwufumana baze bawubone besenyameni yabo.
Ngako oko, phulaphulani ndaye ndiya kuqiqa nani, ndaye ndiya kuthetha nani ndize ndiprofethe njengasebantwini bemihla yakudala.

Kwaye ndiya kubonisa ngokucacileyo njengoko ndakubonisa kubafundi bam njengoko ndema phambi kwabo, disenyameni ndisithi: Njengoko nindicelile ngokunxulumene nemiqondiso yokuza kwam, ngomhla xa ndiya kuza ndisebuqaqawulini bam emafini asezulwini, ukuzalisekisa izithembiso endizenze kooyihlo,

Kuba njengokuba nithe nakhangela ukungabikho okude komoya wenu emizimbeni yenu kube bubukhoboka, ndiya kunibonisa ukuba umhla wenkululeko uya kuza njani na, kananjalo ubuyiselo lokusasazwa lukaSirayeli.
Kwaye ngoku nina nijonge kule tempile iseYerusalem, nina eniyibiza ngokuba yindlu kaThixo, kwaye iintshaba zenu zithi okokuba le ndlu ayisayi kuwa.
Kodwa, inene ndithi kuni, inkangala iya kuza phezu kwesi sizukulwana njengesela ebusuku, kwaye aba bantu baya kutshatyalaliswa baze basasazwe phakathi kwezizwe zonke.
Kwaye le tempile eniyibonayo ngoku iya kukhahlelwa phantsi ukuze kungabisayi kusala nelitye elinye phezu kwelinye.
Kwaye kuye kwenzeka, okokuba esi sizukulwana samaYuda singabi sadlula kude kube yonke inkangala esinixelele ngayo ngokunxulumene nabo iya kudlula.
Nina nithi okokuba niyazi isiphelo sehlabathi siyeza; nithi kanjalo okokuba niyazi ukuba amazulu nomhlaba aya kudlula;
Kwaye koku nithi ngenene, kuba kunjalo ngenene; kodwa ezi zinto ndinixelele zona azisayi kwenzeka kude kube konke kuya kuzalisekiswa.
Kwaye oku ndinixelele ngokunxulemene neYerusalem; kwaye loo mhla uya kuza, intsalela iya kusasazwa phakathi kwezizwe zonke;
Kodwa ziya kuhlanganiswa kwakhona; kodwa ziya kulinda kude ibe ixesha abeeNtlanga liyazalisekiswa.

Kwaye ngaloo mhla kuya kuviwa okweemfazwe namarhe eemfazwe, kwaye wonke umhlaba uya kuba kwizidubedube, kwaye iintliziyo zabantu ziya koyika, kwaye baya kuthi okokuba uKrestu ubambezela ukuza kwakhe kude kube sisiphelo somhlaba.
Kwaye uthando lwabantu luya konakala lubande, kwaye ubugwenxa buya kuba buninzi.
Kwaye xa amaxesha abeeNtlanga efikile, ukukhanya kuya kugqobhozela ngaphambili phakathi kwabo bahleli emnyameni, kwaye kuye kuba kukuzaliseka kwevangeli yam;
Kodwa abakwamkeli; kuba abakuqiqi ukukhanya, kwaye bajika intliziyo zabo zakude kum ngenxa yemiyalelo yabantu.
Kwaye kweso sizukulwana amaxesha abeeNtlanga aya kuzalisekiswa.
Kwaye kuya kubakho abantu abemi kweso sizukulwana, abangasayi kudlula kude kube baya kubona isibetho esiphuphumayo; kuba isifo esiyinkangala siya kugubungela ilizwe.
Kodwa abafundi bam baya kuma kwiindawo ezingcwele, kwaye abayi kushukunyiswa; kodwa phakathi kwabakhohlakeleyo, abantu abaya kuphakamisa amazwi abo baza baqalekise uThixo baze bafe.

Kwaye kuya kubakho iinyikima zomhlaba kanjalo endaweni ezininzi, neentshabalalo ezininzi; nangona kunjalo abantu baya kuziqaqadekisa iintliziyo zabo ngokuchasene nam, kwaye baya kuthabatha ikrele, omnye ngokuchasene nomnye, kwaye baya kubulalana.
Kwaye ngoku, xa mna iNkosi ndithethe la mazwi kubafundi bam, bakhathazeka.
Kwaye ndathi kubo: Maze ningakhathazeki, kuba, zonke ezi zinto ziya kwenzeka, niya kuba nokwazi ukuba izithembiso ezazenziwe kuni ziya kuzalisekiswa.
Kwaye xa ukukhanya kuya kuqala ukugqobhozela ngaphambili, kuya kuba nabo njengomzekeliso endiya kunibonisa wona—
Nina khangelani kwaye niqaphele imikhiwane, kwaye niyibone ngamehlo enu, kwaye nithi xa iqalisa ukuhluma, kwaye amagqabi awo sele ethambile, kungokuba ihlobo likufuphi;
Nkqu kunjalo kuya kuba kuloo mhla xa beya kubona zonke ezi zinto, ngoku ke baya kwazi ukuba ilixa likufuphi.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka ukuba lowo undoyikayo uya kujonga phambili ukuza komhla omkhulu weNkosi, nkqu imiqondiso yokuza koNyana woMntu.
Kwaye baya kubona imiqondiso nemimangaliso, kuba iya kubonakaliswa ngaphambili emazulwini ngasentla, nasemhlabeni ngezantsi.
Kwaye baya kuqaphela igazi, nomlilo, nemiphunga yomsi.
Kwaye phambi kokuza komhla weNkosi, ilanga liya kuba mnyama, ize inyanga ijike ibe ligazi, neenkwenkwezi ziwe ezulwini.
Kwaye intsalela iya kuhlanganiselwa kule ndawo;

Kwaye ngoko baya kukhangela mna, kwaye, qaphela, ndiya kuza; kwaye baya kundibona emafini ezulu, ndinxityiswe ngamandla nobuqaqawuli obukhulu; nazo zonke iingelosi ezingcwele; kwaye lowo ungandilindiyo uya kukhutshelwa ngaphandle.
Kodwa phambi kokuba ingalo yeNkosi ibe iya kuwa, ingelosi iya kukhalisa ixilongo layo, kwaye abangcwele ebebelele baya kuza ngaphambili bandikhawulele ndiselifwini.

Ngako oko, ukuba nilele niseluxolweni nisikelelekile nina; kuba njengokuba nindibona ngoku kwaye nisazi ukuba ndim, nkqu kunjalo niya kuza kum nemiphefumlo yenu iya kuphila, nokukhululwa kwenu kuya kugqityeleliswa; nabangcwele baya kuza ngaphambili bevela kwiimbombo zone zomhlaba.
Ngoko ke ingalo yeNkosi iya kuwa phezu kwezizwe.
Kwaye ngoko iNkosi iya kubeka unyawo lwayo phezu kwentaba, kwaye iya kucandeka kubini, kwaye umhlaba uya kugungqa, kwaye uhexele ngapha nangapha, kwaye amazulu nawo aya kungcangcazela.
Kwaye iNkosi iya kuvakalisa ilizwi layo, zaye zonke iziphelo zomhlaba ziya kuliva; kwaye nezizwe zomhlaba ziya kuba lusizi kwaye abo bahlekileyo baya kububona ubuyatha babo.
Kwaye intlekele iya kugubungela umgculeli, kwaye umgxeki uya kupheliswa; kwaye abo bebelinde ubugwenxa baya kugawulelwa phantsi baze baphoswe emlilweni.
Kwaye amaYuda ngoko aya kukhangela kum aze athi: Ngawantoni la manxeba asezandleni zakho nasezinyaweni zakho?

Ngoko ke aya kwazi ukuba ndiyiNkosi; kuba ndiya kuthi kuwo: La manxeba ngamanxeba kuwo ndenzakaliswa endlwini yabahlobo bam. Ndinguye owanyuselwa phezulu. NdinguYesu lowo wabethelelwayo. NdinguNyana kaThixo.
Kwaye ngoko baya kulila ngenxa yobugwenxa babo; ngoko baya kuba buhlungu ngenxa yokuba batshutshisa ukumkani wabo.
Kwaye ngoko izizwe zabahedeni ziya kukhululwa, baze abo bangawazanga umthetho baya kuba nxaxheba kuvuko lokuqala; kwaye kuya kunyamezeleka kubo.
Kwaye uSathana uya kukhonkxwa, ukuze angabi nandawo ezintliziyweni zabantwana babantu.
Kwaye ngaloo mhla, xa ndiya kuza ebuqaqawulini bam, umzekeliso uya kuzalisekiswa endathetha ngawo ngokunxulumene neentombi ezilishumi.

Kuba abo balumkileyo baza bayamkela inyaniso, baza bamkele uMoya oyiNgcwele ukuze ubesisikhokelo sabo, baza abakhohliswa—inene ndithi kubo, abayi kugawulelwa phantsi baze baphoselwe emlilweni, kodwa baya kuwunyamezela umhla.
Kwaye umhlaba uya kunikwa bona ubelilifa; kwaye baya kwanda baza bomelele, nabantwana babo baya kukhulela elusindisweni ngaphandle kwesono.
Kuba iNkosi iya kuba phakathi kwabo, kwaye nobuqaqawuli nayo buya kuba phezu kwabo, kwaye iya kuba ngukumkani wabo nommisi-mthetho wabo.

Kwaye ngoku, qaphelani, ndithi kuni, akuyi kunikwa kuni, ukwazi okungaphaya ngokunxulumene nesi sahluko, kude kube iTestamente eNtsha iguqulelwe, kwaye kuyo zonke ezi zinto ziya kwenziwa ukuba zaziwe;
Ngako oko ndinikela kuni ukuba nibe nokuyiguqulela ngoku, ukuze nibe nokulungiselela izinto ezizayo.
Kuba inene ndithi kuni, okokuba izinto ezinkulu zinilindele;
Niva ngeemfazwe emazweni asemzini; kodwa qaphelani, ndithi kuni, zikufutshane, nkqu eminyangweni yenu, kwaye asiyiyo iminyaka emininzi nibe niya kuva ngemfazwe kumazwe wenu.

Ngako oko mna, iNkosi, nditshilo, zihlanganiseni ukususela kumazwe asempumalanga, zihlanganiseni kunye nina badala bebandla lam; yiyani ngaphambili kumazwe asentshonalanga, bizani abemi baguquke, kwaye njengokuba beguquka, yakhelani mna amabandla.
Kwaye ngentliziyo enye nangengqondo enye, qokelelani ubutyebi benu ukuze nibe nokuthenga ilifa eliya konyulelwa nina ngoku nakwixesha elizayo.
Kwaye liya kubizwa ngokuba yiYerusalem eNtsha, ilizwe loxolo, isixeko esiligwiba, indawo yokhuseleko yabangcwele bakaThixo oseNyangweni;
Kwaye ubuqaqawuli beNkosi buya kuba nabo, kwaye uloyiko lweNkosi luya kuba lapho, njengokuba abakhohlakeleyo abayi kuza kulo, kwaye iya kubizwa iZiyon.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka phakathi kwabakhohlakeleyo, okokuba wonke umntu ongayi kuthabatha ikrele lakhe ngokuchasene nommelwane wakhe anyanzeleke asabele ukhuseleko eZiyon.
Kwaye apho kuya kuhlanganisana kuyo bephuma kwisizwe ngasinye esiphantsi kwezulu; kwaye iya kuba kukuphela kwabantu abangayi kuba semfazweni omnye nomnye.
Kwaye kuya kuthiwa phakathi kwabakhohlakeleyo: Masingahambi siyokulwa ngokuchasene neZiyon, kuba abemi beZiyon bayoyikeka; ngako oko asinako ukumelana nabo.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka okokuba amalungisa aya kuhlanganisana aphume phakathi kwezizwe zonke, kwaye aya kuza eZiyon, ecula iingoma zokugcoba kwanaphakade.

Kwaye ngoku ndithi kuni, gcinani ezi zinto ekuyeni phesheya ehlabathini kude kube kufanelekile kum, ukuze nibe niwufezile lo msebenzi emehlweni abantu, nasemehlweni eentshaba zenu, ukuze zibe nokwazi imisebenzi yenu nide nibe nifeze into endiniyalele yona;
Ukuze xa beya kuyazi, babe baya kucinga ezi zinto.
Kuba xa iNkosi iya kubonakala iya koyikeka kubo, kuba uloyiko lobabamba, kwaye baya kuma qelele baze bangcangcazele.
Kwaye zonke izizwe ziya koyika ngenxa yokoyikeka kweNkosi, namandla okomelela kwayo. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Abadala bamele ukuqhuba iindibano njengoko bakhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele; 3–6, Abafuni benyaniso abamelanga ukukhethelwa ngaphandle kwiinkqubo zomthendeleko; 7–12, Celani kuThixo nize nifune izipho zoMoya; 13–26, Uluhlu lwezinye lwezi zipho lunikiwe; 27–33, Iinkokeli zeBandla zinikwe amandla okucalula izipho zoMoya.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu nina bantu bebandla lam, kuba inene ndithi kuni okokuba ezi zinto zathethwa kuni ukuninceda nokufunda.

Kodwa nangona ezo zinto zibhaliweyo, kusoloko kunikwa abadala bebandla lam ukususela kwasekuqaleni, kwaye kuya kusoloko kunjalo, ukuqhuba zonke iindibano njengoko belawulwa kwaye bekhokelwa nguMoya oyiNgcwele.
Nangona kunjalo niyayalelwa ningaze nikhuphele namnye ngaphandle kwiindibano zenu zesidlangalala, ezibanjwa phambi kwehlabathi.
Niyayalelwa kanjalo ningakhupheli namnye ngaphandle ongowebandla kwiindibano zenu zomthendeleko; nangona kunjalo, ukuba kukho owonayo, makangathabathi atye ade abe wenze uxolelwaniso.
Kwaye kwakhona ndithi kuni, anisayi kukhuphela namnye ngaphandle kwiindibano zenu zomthendeleko abafuna ngenzondelelo ubukumkani—ndithetha oku ngokunxulumene nabo bangengabo abebandla.
Kwaye kwakhona ndithi kuni, ngokunxulumene neendibano zenu zoqiniso, ukuba ngaba kukho nabani na abangengabo abebandla, abafuna ngenzondelelo ubukumkani, aniyi kuba khuphela ngaphandle.

Kodwa niyayalelwa kuzo zonke izinto nicele kuThixo, onika engenakumbi; kwaye noko uMoya ukungqinayo kuni nkqu kunjalo ndinga ningenza kubo bonke ubungcwele bentliziyo, nihamba ngokuthe mbo phambi kwam, nicingela isiphelo sosindiso lwenu, nisenza zonke izinto ngomthandazo nombulelo, ukuze ningalahlekiswa ngoomoya abangcolileyo okanye iimfundiso zoomtyholi, okanye imiyalelo yabantu; kuba ezinye zezabantu, kwaye ezinye zezoomtyholi.
Ngako oko, lumkani hleze nikhohliswe, nokokuba nibe aninakukhohliswa funani ngenzondelelo ezona zipho, nisoloko nikhumbula oko nikunikiweyo;

Kuba inene ndithi kuni, zinikelwa ukunceda abo bathanda mna baze bagcine yonke imiyalelo yam, nalowo ufuna ukwenza njalo; ukuze bonke babe nokuncedakala abo bafunayo okanye bacela kum, abacelayo kwaye ingabi kokomqondiso ukuze babe nokuzichithela ezinkanukweni zabo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, ndinga ningasoloko nikhumbula, kwaye nisoloko nigcine ezingqondweni zenu oko ezo zipho zikuko, okokuba zinikwe ibandla.
Kuba bonke abanazo zonke izipho ezinikwe bona; kuba izipho ezininzi, kwaye wonke umntu unikwe isipho ngoMoya kaThixo.
Kwabathile kunikwe esinye, nakwabathile kunikwe esinye, ukuze zonke zibe nokuncedisana.
Kwabanye sinikwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ukwazi okokuba uYesu Krestu nguNyana kaThixo, nokokuba wabethelelelwa izono zehlabathi.
Kwabanye sinekelwe ukukholelwa emazwini abo, okokuba banako kanjalo ukuba nobomi obungunaphakade ukuba baqhubekeka bethembekile.

Kwaye kwakhona, kwabathile sinikwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele ukwazi iindlela ezingafaniyo zolungiselelo, njengoko kuya kukholiseka kwa kuyo iNkosi, ngokunxulumene njengoko iNkosi iya kuthanda, okufanele iinceba zayo ngokunxulumene kwiimeko zabantwana babantu.
Kwaye kwakhona, sinikwe ngoMoya oyiNgcwele kwabanye ekwazini iindlela ezininzi zokuwusebenzisa, nokokuba zezikaThixo, ukuze ukubonakaliswa koMoya kube nokunikwa kubo bonke abantu bancedakale ngawo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, kwabathile sinikwe, ngoMoya kaThixo, ilizwi lobulumko.
Komnye sinikwe ngelizwi lolwazi, ukuze bonke babe nokufundiswa ukulumka nokuba nolwazi.
Kwaye kwakhona, kwabathile sinikelwe ukuba nokholo ukuze baphile;
Kwaye kwabanye sinikelwe ukuba nokholo lokuphilisa.
Kwaye kwakhona, kwabathile sinikelwe ukusebenza kwemimangaliso;
Kwaye kwabanye sinikelwe ukuprofetha;
Kwaye kwabanye sinikelwe ukucalula komoya.
Kwaye kwakhona, sinikelwe kwabathile bathethe ngeelwimi;
Kwaye komnye sinikelwe ukutolika iilwimi.
Kwaye zonke ezi zipho zivela kuThixo, ukunceda abantwana bakaThixo.

Kwaye kubhishophu webandla, nakwabanjalo njengoko uThixo aya konyula aze abamisele ekulunguzeni phezu kwebandla baze babe ngabadala ebandleni, bafanele ukusifumana sinikwe bona banakane zonke ezoo zipho hleze kube kuya kubakho nabani na phakathi kwenu ozisebenzisayo kwaye abe akanguye okaThixo.
Kwaye kuya kwenzeka okokuba lowo ucela eseMoyeni uya kufumana kuMoya;
Kuba kwabathile sinokunikelwa ukuba nazo zonke izipho, ukuze kube nokubakho kwentloko, ukuze ngoko onke amalungu abe nokuncedakala yiloo nto.
Lowo ucela eseMoyeni ecela ngokunxulumene nentando kaThixo; ngako oko kuyenzeka nkqu njengoko ecela.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndithi kuni, zonke izinto zimele ukwenziwa egameni likaKrestu, nantoni na eniyenza kuMoya;
Kwaye nimele ukunika umbulelo kuThixo nikuMoya ngayo nayiphi na intsikelelo enisikelelwe ngayo.
Kwaye nimele ukwenza isidima nobungcwele njalo niqhubekeka phambi kwam. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, UJohn Whitmer wonyulelwa ukugcina imbali yeBandla nokubhalela uMprofeti.

verses.text: Qaphela, kufanelekile kum okokuba isicaka sam uJohn abhale aze agcine imbali esisigxina, kwaye akuncedise, sicaka sam Joseph, ekukhupheleni zonke izinto eziya kunikwa wena, ade abe ubizelwe eminye imisebenzi.
Kwakhona, inene ndithi kuwe okokuba unako kanjalo ukuphakamisa ilizwi lakhe ezintlanganisweni, naninina kuya kufaneleka.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndithi kuwe okokuba kuya konyulelwa kuye ukugcina ingxelo nembali yebandla ngokuqhubekekayo; kuba uOliver Cowdery ndimonyulele kwenye iofisi.
Ngako oko, kuya kunikwa kuye, njengokuba eya kuthembeka, nguMonwabisi, abhale ezi zinto. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, AbaNgcwele eOhio bamele ukwabelana nabazalwana babo; 4–6, AbaNgcwele bamele ukuthenga imihlaba, bakhe isixeko, baze balandele ingcebiso yamagosa abo ongameleyo.

verses.text: Kufanekile okokuba nishiye kwithuba langoku ezindaweni zenu zokuhlala, njengoko kuya kulungela iimeko zenu.
Kwaye kangangoko niya kufumana imihlaba, niya kugqithisela kubazalwana basempumalanga.

Kwaye kangangokuba ningayi kufumana imihlaba, bavumeleni ngethuba langoku kwezo ngingqi zibangqongileyo, njengoko kubonakala kubalungele, kuba kuyimfuneko efanelekileyo okokuba bafumane iindawo zokuhlala ngethuba langoku.

Kuyimfuneko efanelekileyo okokuba nilondoloze yonke imali njengokuba ninako, nanjengokuba ninokuyifumana ngako konke eninako ngobulungisa, ukuze ethubeni nibe niya kuba nako ukuthenga umhlaba wokuba lilifa, nkqu isixeko.
Indawo ayikabi nakutyhilwa; kodwa emva kokuba abazalwana benu befikile ukusuka empumalanga kuya kubakho abantu abathile abonyuliweyo, kwaye baya kuba benikwe ukwazi indawo, okanye kubo iya kutyhilwa.

Kwaye baya konyulelwa ukuthenga imihlaba, nokwenza isiqalo sokubeka isiseko sesixeko; kwaye ngoko baya kuqalisa ukuhlanganisana neentsapho zenu, wonke umntu ngokunxulumene nosapho lwakhe, ngokunxulumene neemeko zakhe, nanjengoko konyulelwe kuye bububongameli nobhishophu webandla, ngokunxulumene nemithetho nemiyalelo enithe nayifumana, naleyo niya kuyifumana ukususela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, Umhla nelixa lokuza kukaKrestu uya kuhlala ungaziwa ade Yena eze; 8–14, Abantu bamele ukuguquka, bakholwe yivangeli, baze bathobele imimiselo ukuzuza usindiso; 15–16, Umtshato umiselwe nguThixo; 17–21, Ukutyiwa kwenyama kuvunyelwe; 22–28, IZiyon iya kuchuma kwaye amaLeymenayithi adubule njengerozi phambi kokuBuya kweSibini.

verses.text: Phulaphulani ilizwi, zicaka zam Sidney, noParley, noLeman; kuba qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba ndininika umyalelo wokokuba niya kuhamba nize nishumayele ivangeli yam eniyamkeleyo, nkqu njengoko nithe nayamkela, kwiShakers.
Qaphelani, ndithi kuni, abo banqwenela ukwazi inyaniso nje inxalenye, kodwa ingabi yiyo yonke, ngabangalungileyo phambi kwam kwaye kuyimfuneko beguqukile.
Ngako oko, ndithumela nina, zicaka zam Sidney noParley, ekushumayeleni ivangeli yam kubo.

Kwaye isicaka sam uLeman uya kumiselwa kulo msebenzi; aze abe nokuqondisana nabo, ingabi ngokunxulemene koko athe wakufumana kubo, kodwa ngokunxulumene noko kuya kufundisa yena efundiswa nini zicaka zam; kwaye ngokweza njalo ndiya kumsikelela, okanye akayi kuphumelela.

Itsho njalo iNkosi; kuba ndinguThixo, kwaye ndithumele owam uNyana oKuphela Kozelweyo ehlabathini ukuza akhulule ihlabathi, aze amisele ukuba lowo umamkelayo yena uya kusindiswa, kwaye lowo ungamamkeliyo uya kugwetywa—

Kwaye benza kuNyana woMntu nkqu njengoko kudwelisiwe; waye wathabatha amandla akhe ngasekunene kobuqaqawuli bakhe, kwaye ngoku ulawula emazulwini, kwaye uya kulawula ade ahlele emhlabeni abeke zonke iintshaba phantsi kwenyawo zakhe, xesha elo likufuphi—
Mna, iNkosi uThixo, ndikuthethile; kodwa ilixa nomhla akukho owaziyo, nazingelosi ezulwini, nabanina oya kwazi ade afike.
Ngako oko, ndinga bonke abantu baya kuguquka, kuba bonke baphantsi kwesono, ngaphandle kwabo ndibalondolozele isiqu sam, abantu abangcwele eningabaziyo.
Ngako oko, ndithi kuni okokuba ndithumele kuni umnqophiso wam wanaphakade, nkqu lowo wawunguwo kwasekuqalekeni.
Kwaye lowo ndithembise ngawo ndiwuzalisekisileyo njalo, kwaye izizwe zomhlaba ziya kuqubuda kuwo; kwaye, ukuba akukokwazo, ziya kuza phantsi, kuba oko ngoku kuziphakamisileyo kuya kuthotywa amandla.
Ngako oko, ndininika umyalelo wokuba yiyani phakathi kwaba bantu, nize nithi kubo, njengompostile wam wakudala, ogama lakhe lalinguPetros:
Kholwani egameni leNkosi uYesu, owayesemhlabeni, kwaye uya kuza, nesiqalo nesiphelo;
Guqukani nize nibhaptizelwe egameni likaYesu Krestu, ngokunxulumene nomyalelo ongcwele, woxolelo lwezono;
Kwaye nabani owenza oku uya kwamkela isipho soMoya oyiNgcwele, ngokubekwa kwezandla zabadala bebandla.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba nabani owalayo ukutshata akamiselwanga nguThixo, kuba umtshato umiselwe nguThixo ebantwini.
Ngako oko, kungumthetho okokuba umele kukuba nomfazi omnye, kwaye abo babini baya kuba nyamanye, kwaye konke oku kokokuba umhlaba ube nokuphendula isiphelo sendalo yawo;
Nokokuba ube nokuzaliswa ngomlinganiselo womntu, ngokunxulumene nendalo yakhe phambi kokwenziwa kwehlabathi.
Kwaye nabanina owalelweyo ukuba azikhwebule ezinyameni, ezo umntu angamelanga kuzitya onjalo, akamiselwanga nguThixo;
Kuba, qaphelani, izilo zasendle neentaka zezulu, nako oko kuvela emhlabeni, zimiselwe ukusetyenziselwa ukutya neengubo ngabantu, nokokuba abe nako kube kuninzi.
Kodwa akunikwanga okokuba umntu omnye abe noko kungaphezulu kunomnye, ngako oko ihlabathi lihleli esonweni.
Kwaye yeha kuloo mntu uphalaza igazi okanye wenza inkcitho yenyama kwaye engenamfuno yayo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba uNyana woMntu akezi ekwimo yomfazi, ingeyiyo neyomntu ohamba emhlabeni.

Ngako oko, musani ukukhohliswa, kodwa qhubekekani nime nithe nkqi, nijonge ngaphambili ukuba amazulu agungqume, nomhlaba ungcagazele uze uhexele ngapha nangapha njengendoda enxilileyo, nokokuba iintlambo zinyuswe, neentaba zenziwe zibe phantsi, neendawo ezirhabaxa zibe mpuluswa—kwaye konke oku xa ingelosi iya kukhalisa ixilongo layo.
Kodwa phambi komhla omkhulu weNkosi oya kuza, uYakobi uya kuchuma entlango, namaLeymenayithi aya kutyatyamba njengerozi.
IZiyon iya kudubula phezu kweenduli ize igcobe phezu kweentaba, kwaye iya kuhlanganisana kunye kwindawo endiyonyulileyo.
Qaphelani ndithi kuni, yiyani ngaphambili njengoko ndiniyaleleyo; guqukani kuzo zonke izono zenu; celani naye niya kuphiwa; nkqonkqozani naye niya kuvulelwa.
Qaphelani, ndiya kuhamba phambi kwenu kwaye ndibe ngumqoshelisi wenu; kwaye ndiya kuba phakathi kwenu, kwaye aniyi kubhidaniswa.
Qaphelani, ndinguYesu Krestu, kwaye ndiyeza kamsinya. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, Oomoya bobuxoki abaninzi bangapha nangapha emhlabeni; 6–9, Yeha kubahanahanisi nabo bakhutshelwe ngaphandle eBandleni; 10–14, Abadala bamele ukushumayela ivangeli ngoMoya; 15–22, Kunye abashumayeli nabamameli kufuneka bahlaziywe ngoMoya; 23–25, Oko kungathanga kuhlaziywe asikuko okukaThixo; 26–28, Abathembekileyo ngabanini bezinto zonke; 29–36, Imithandazo yabahlanjululweyo iyaphendulwa; 37–46, UKrestu nguMalusi oLungileyo neLitye likaSirayeli.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu badala bebandla lam, nize ninike indlebe elizwini loThixo ophilileyo; kwaye nilungiselele amazwi obulumko aya kunikwa nina, ngokunxulumene njengoko nithe nacela naze navuma njengokokuchukumisa ibandla, nomoya abathe baya ngaphesheya emhlabeni.
Qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba baninzi oomoya abangoomoya abangcolileyo, abathe beza ngaphambili emhlabeni, bekholisa ihlabathi.
Kananjalo uSathana ufune ukukhohlisa, ukuze abenokunibhukuqa.
Qaphelani, mna, iNkosi, ndijonge phezu kwenu, ndaza ndabona amasikizi ebandleni elibhengeza igama lam.
Kodwa basikelelekile abo bathembekileyo baze banyamezele, nokokuba kusebomini okanye ekufeni, kuba baya kufumana ilifa lobomi obungunaphakade.
Kodwa yeha kwabo bangabakhohlisi nabahanahanisi, kuba, itsho njalo iNkosi, ndiya kubazisa emgwebeni.
Qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, kukho abahanahanisi phakathi kwenu, abakhohlise abathile, abanike utshaba amandla; kodwa qaphelani abanjalo baya kubangwa kwakhona;

Kodwa abahanahanisi baya kufunyanwa baze bakhutshwelwe ngaphandle, nokokuba kusebomini okanye ekufeni, nkqu njengoko ndiya kwenza; kwaye yeha kwabo bakhutshelwe ngaphandle ebandleni lam, kuba abanjalo boyiswa lihlabathi.
Ngako oko, vumelani wonke umntu alumke hleze enze oko kungeyonyaniso nobulungisa phambi kwam.
Kwaye ngoku yizani, ngoMoya, itsho iNkosi, kubadala bebandla layo, kwaye masiqondisane kunye, ukuze nibe nokuqonda;
Masiqondisane nkqu njengomntu eqondisana omnye nomnye ubuso ngobuso.
Ngoku, xa umntu eqondisisa uyaqondwa ngabantu, ngenxa yokuba uqondisisa njengomntu; nkqu kunjalo mna, iNkosi, ndiya kuqondisisana nani ukuze nibe nokuqonda.
Ngako oko, mna iNkosi ndimbuza lo mbuzo—nanimiselwe entweni?
Ekushumayeleni ivangeli yam ngoMoya, nkqu ngoMonwabisi owathunyelwa ngaphambili ekufundiseni inyaniso.
Kwaye ngoko nifumene oomoya eningenako ukubaqonda, nize nibamkele ngokungathi ngabakaThixo; kwaye kuko oku ingaba nilungisile?
Qaphelani niza kuwuphendula lo mbuzo ngokwenu; nangona kunjalo, ndiya kuba nenceba kuni; lowo ubuthathaka phakathi kwenu ngoku nakwixesha elizayo uya kwenziwa omelele.
Inene ndithi kuni, lowo umiselwe ndim waza wathunyelwa ngaphambili aye kushumayela ilizwi lenyaniso ngoMonwabisi, ekuMoya wenyaniso, lowo ulishumayela ngoMoya wenyaniso okanye ngenye indlela?
Kwaye ukuba ke kungenye indlela ethile ayiyiyo ekaThixo.
Kwaye kwakhona, lowo wamkela ilizwi lenyaniso, ingaba ulamkela ngoMoya wenyaniso okanye ngenye indlela ethile?
Ukuba kungenye indlela ethile ayiyiyo ekaThixo.
Ke ngoko, kutheni okokuba ningabi nako ukuqonda nokwazi, okokuba lowo wamkela ilizwi ngoMoya wenyaniso ulamkela njengoko lishunyayelwa nguMoya wenyaniso?
Ngako oko, lowo ushumayelayo nalowo wamkelayo, bayaqondana omnye nomye, kwaye bobabini baya kuhlaziyeka baze bagcobe kunye.
Kwaye oko kungahlaziyiyo asikuko okukaThixo, kwaye kububumnyama.

Oko kukokukaThixo kukukhanya; kwaye lowo wamkela ukukhanya, aze baqhubekeke kuThixo, wamkela ukukhanya okungakumbi; kwaye oko kukhanya kuya kuqaqamba ngakumbi nangakumbi kude kube ngumhla ogqibeleleyo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, kwaye ndikutsho ukuze nibe nokuyazi inyaniso, ukuze nibe nokususa ubumnyama okuvela phakathi kwenu;
Lowo umiselwe nguThixo waza wathunyelwa ngaphambili, onjalo unyulelwe ukuba ngoyena mkhulu, nangona lowo engoyena mncinane kwaye usisicaka sabo bonke.

Ngako oko, ungumnini wento zonke; kuba zonke izinto ziphantsi kwakhe, kunye ezulwini nasemhlabeni, ubomi nokukhanya, uMoya namandla, zithunyelwe ngaphambili ngentando kaBawo ngoYesu Krestu, uNyana wakhe.
Kodwa akukho mntu ungumnini wento zonke ngaphandle kokuba lowo uhlanjululwe waza wacocwa kuso sonke isono.
Kwaye ukuba nihlanjululwe naza nacocwa kuso sonke isono, niya kucela nantonina eniya kuyifuna egameni likaYesu kwaye iya kwenziwa.
Kodwa yazini oku, niya kunikwa oko niya kukucela; kwaye njengokuba nonyulwe entloko, oomoya baya kuba phantsi kwenu.

Ngako oko, kuya kwenzeka, okokuba xa niqaphela umoya obonakaliswayo eningenako ukuwuqonda, nize ningamkeli loo moya, niya kubuza kuBawo egameni likaYesu; aze ukuba akaniniki loo moya, ngoko ke niya kuba nokwazi ukuba akanguwo okaThixo.
Kwaye niya kunikwa, amandla ngaphezu kwaloo moya; kwaye niya kubhengeza ngokuchasene naloo moya ngelizwi elikhwazayo okokuba akanguwo okaThixo—
Ningenakumelana nomgwebo wakunyelisa, ukuze ningoyiswa, nangakuzigwagwisa okanye ukugcoba, hleze nibanjwe apho kunye.
Lowo wamkela okukaThixo, makakwenzele ingxelo okukaThixo; kwaye makagcobe kuba ubalelwe kuThixo ukuba kufanelekile ukumamkela.
Kwaye ngokunika inyameko nokwenza ezi zinto nizamkeleyo, nezo niya kuzamkela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo—kwaye ubukumkani bukaBawo nibunikwe, namandla okoyisa zonke izinto ezingamiselwanga nguye—
Kwaye qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, nisikelelekile nina ngoku nimamele la mazwi am avela emlonyeni wesicaka sam, kuba izono zenu zixolelwe.
Vumelani isicaka sam uJoseph Wakefield, kuso endikholisiweyo, nesicaka sam uParley P. Pratt baye ngaphambili phakathi kwamabandla baze bawomeleze ngelizwi lemvuselelo;

Kananjalo isicaka sam uJohn Corrill, okanye njengabaninzi bezicaka zam eziya kumiselwa kule ofisi, nize nizivumele zisebenze esidiliyeni; kwaye ningavumeli mntu abaphazamise ekwenzeni oko ndibonyulele kona—
Ngako oko, kule nto isicaka sam uEdward Partridge akalungisanga; nangona kunjalo mvumeleni aguquke kwaye uya kuxolelwa.
Qaphelani, ningabantwana abancinane kwaye aninako ukuthwala zonke izinto ngoku; nimele ukukhula elubabalweni nakulwazi lwenyaniso.
Ningoyiki, bantwana abancinane, kuba ningabam, ndaye ndiloyisile ihlabathi, kwaye ningababanye babo uBawo owabanika mna;
Kwaye akakho namnye owabo uBawo abanike mna oya kulahleka.
Kwaye uBawo nam sibanye. NdikuBawo kwaye uBawo ukum; kwaye njengokuba nindamkele, nikum kwaye nam ndikuni.
Ngako oko, ndiphakathi kwenu, kwaye ndingumalusi olungileyo, nelitye likaSirayeli. Lowo wakhela phezu kolu lwalwa akasayi kuwa.
Kwaye umhla uyeza eniya kuva ilizwi lam nize nindibone, nize nazi ukuba ndim.
Lindani, ke ngoko, ukuze nibe nihleli nizilungiselele. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, UEdward Partridge wonyulelwe ukuba alungelelelanise ubugosa nezakhiwo neempahla; 9–12, AbaNgcwele bamele ukusebenzisana ngokunyaniseka baze bafumane ngokufanayo; 13–15, Bamele ukuba novimba kabhishophu baze balungiselele izakhiwo neempahla ngokunxulumene nomthetho weNkosi; 16–20, IOhio iza kuba yindawo yethutyana yokuhlanganisana.

verses.text: Phulaphulani kum, itsho iNkosi uThixo wenu, kwaye ndiya kuthetha nesicaka sam uEdward Partridge, ndize ndimnike izikhokelo; kuba kuyimfuneko okokuba afumane izikhokelo zokulungiselela aba bantu.
Kuba kuyimfuneko ukuba balungiselelwe ngokunxulumene nemithetho yam; ukuba benza ngenye indlela, baya kusikelwa ngaphandle.

Ngako oko, vumelani isicaka sam uEdward Partridge, nabo abakhethileyo, endikholisiweyo ngabo, onyulele aba bantu izahlulo zabo, ngokulinganayo wonke umntu ngokunxulumene nosapho lwakhe, ngokunxulumene neemeko zakhe neemfuno zakhe nezo azisweleyo.

Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uEdward Partridge, xa eya kunika umntu isabelo sakhe, amnike umbhalo oya kukhusela isabelo sakhe kuye, okokuba abe uya kusigcina, nkqu eli lungelo neli lifa ebandleni, ade abe uyona aze angabalelwa ukuba ufanelekile ngeli lizwi le bandla, ngokunxulumene nemithetho nemiqophiso yebandla, abe ungowebandla.

Kwaye ukuba uya kona aze angabalelwa ukuba ufanelekile ukuba ngowebandla, akayi kuba namandla okubanga isabelo asingcwalisele amahlwempu nabasweleyo kubhishophu webandla; ke ngoko, akayi kugcina sipho, kodwa uya kubanga kuphela isabelo esenzelwe yena.
Kwaye kungoko zonke izinto ziya kwenziwa ziqiniseke, ngokunxulumene nomthetho welizwe.
Kwaye vumelani oko kukokwaba bantu kwabelwe kwaba bantu.
Kwaye imali eshiywe kwaba bantu—makubekho iarhente enyulelwe aba bantu, ithathe imali yokubonelela ngokutya neengubo, ngokunxulumene neemfuno zaba bantu.
Kwaye vumelani wonke umntu asebenze ngokunyanisekileyo, kwaye kufananwe phakathi kwaba bantu, kwaye bafumane ngokufanayo, ukuze nibe banye, nkqu njengoko ndimyaleleyo.
Kwaye vumelani oko kukokwaba bantu kungathathwa kuze kunikwe kokwelinye ibandla.
Ngako oko, ukuba elinye ibandla liya kufumana imali yeli bandla, bavumeleni bahlawule kweli bandla kwakhona ngokunxulumene njengoko beya kuvuma;
Kwaye oku kuya kwenziwa ngubhishophu okanye iarhente, eya konyulwa ngelizwi lebandla.

Kwaye kwakhona, vumelani ubhishophu onyule uvimba kweli bandla; kwaye vumelani zonke izinto kunye emalini nasenyameni, ezingaphezu koko kuyimfuneko zibe zezeemfuno zaba bantu, zigcinwe ezandleni zikabhishophu.
Kwaye nivumele kanjalo agcinele isiqu sakhe iimfuno ezizezakhe, neemfuno zosapho lwakhe, njengokuba eya kuqeshwa ngokwenza lo mcimbi.
Kwaye kungoko ndinika aba bantu ilungelo elilodwa lokuzilungiselela ngokunxulumene nemithetho yam.
Kwaye ndibangcwalisela lo mhlaba okwexesha elincinci, kude kube mna, iNkosi, ndiya kubabonelela ngenye indlela, kwaye ndibayalele ukumka kule ndawo;
Kwaye ilixa nomhla abawunikwanga, ngako oko bavumeleni basebenze kulo mhlaba kangangeminyaka, kwaye oku kuya kubuyela kubo ikokulungele bona.
Qaphelani, lo iya kuba ngumzekelo kwisicaka sam uEdward Partridge, kwezinye iindawo, kuwo onke amabandla.
Kwaye lowo ufunyanwa ethembekile, elilungisa, kwaye eligosa elilumkileyo uya kungena ekugcobeni kweNkosi, kwaye uya kufumana ilifa lobomi obungunaphakade.
Inene, ndithi kuni, ndinguYesu Krestu, oza ngokukhawuleza, ngexesha ongalicingelanga. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, Inkomfa elandelayo yalathelwa ukuba ibanjelwe eMissouri; 3–8, Izigqibo zabadala abathile zokuba bahambe kunye ziyenziwa; 9–11, Abadala bamele ukufundisa oko abapostile nabaprofeti bakubhalileyo; 12–21, Abo bakhanyiselwe nguMoya bazisa ngaphambili iziqhamo zokudumisa nobulumko; 22–44, Abadala abahlukeneyo bonyulelwa ukuya ngaphambili bashumayele ivangeli ngeli xesha baya eMissouri enkomfeni.

verses.text: Qaphelani, itsho njalo iNkosi ebadaleni abo ibabizileyo yaza yabakhetha kule mihla yokugqibela, ngelizwi loMoya—

Usithi: Mna, iNkosi, ndiya kwenza kwazeke kuni oko ndiya kwenza ukususela kweli xesha kude kube yinkomfa elandelayo, eya kubanjelwa eMissouri, phezu komhlaba endiya kuwungcwalisela ebantwini bam, abayintsalela kaYakobi, nabo baziindlalifa ngokomnqophiso.

Ngako oko, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani izicaka zam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., noSidney Rigdon bathabathe uhambo lwabo ngokukhawuleza nje, amalungiselelo enako ukwenzeka ekubeni bashiye amakhaya abo, baze baye kumhlaba waseMissouri.
Kwaye njengokuba bethembekile kum, kuya kwenziwa kwaziwe kubo oko baya kukwenza;
Kwaye njengokuba bethembekile, kuya kwenziwa kanjalo kwaziwe kubo umhlaba welifa lenu.
Kwaye njengokuba bengathembekanga, baya kukhutshelwa ngaphandle, nkqu njengoko ndiya kwenza, kubonakala kulungile kum.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani isicaka sam uLyman Wight nesicaka sam uJohn Corrill bathathe uhambo lwabo ngokukhawuleza;
Kananjalo nesicaka sam uJohn Murdock, nesicaka sam uHyrum Smith bathabathe uhambo lwabo ukuya kwindawo enye ngendlela yaseDetroit.
Kwaye bavumeleni bahambe ukusukela apho beshumayela ilizwi endleleni, besithi azikho ezinye izinto kunezo abaprofeti nabapostile bazibhalayo, nezo bazifundiswa ngoMonwabisi ngomthandazo wokholo.
Bavumeleni bahambe ngababini ngababini, kwaye ngoko mabashumayele endleleni kuzo zonke iintlangano, bebhaptiza ngamanzi, baze babeke izandla ecaleni kwamanzi.
Kuba itsho njalo iNkosi, ndiya kuwusika umsebenzi wam ubemfutshane ebulungiseni, kuba iyeza imihla endiya kuthumela ngaphambili umgwebo eloyisweni.
Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uLyman Wight alumke, kuba uSathana unqwenela ukumhluza njengomququ.
Kwaye qaphelani, lowo uthembekileyo uya kwenziwa umlawuli phezu kwezinto ezininzi.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndiya kunika umfuziselo kwiinto zonke, ukuze ningabi nakukhohliswa, kuba uSathana ungapha nangapha elizweni, kwaye uhamba ngaphambili ekhohlisa izizwe—
Ngako oko lowo uthandazayo, unomoya otyumkileyo, onjalo wamkelekile kum ukuba uthobela imimiselo yam.
Lowo uthethayo, onomoya otyumkileyo, ulwimi lwakhe lunobulali kwaye luhlaziya, onjalo ngokaThixo ukuba uthobela imimiselo yam.
Kwaye kwakhona, lowo ungcangcazelayo phantsi kwamandla am uya kwenziwa omelele, kwaye uya kuzisa ngaphambili iziqhamo zokudumisa nobulumko, ngokunxulumene nezityhilelo neenyaniso endininike zona.
Kwaye kwakhona, lowo woyisayo aze angazisi ngaphambili iziqhamo, nkqu ngokunxulumene nalo mfuziselo, akanguye owam.
Ngako oko, ngalo mfuziselo niya kwazi oomoya kuzo zonke iimeko phantsi kwamazulu onke.
Kwaye imihla ifikile; ngokunxulumene nokholo lwabantu kuya kwenziwa njalo kubo.
Qaphelani, lo myalelo unikwe bonke abadala endibakhethileyo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani isicaka sam uThomas B. Marsh nesicaka sam uEzra Thayre bathabathe uhambo lwabo kanjalo, bashumayele ilizwi endleleni eya kwa kulo mhlaba.
Kwaye kwakhona, vumelani isicaka sam uIsaac Morley nesicaka sam uEzra Booth bathabathe uhambo lwabo, kanjalo bashumayele ilizwi endleleni eya kwa kulo mhlaba.
Kwaye kwakhona, vumelani izicaka zam uEdward Partridge noMartin Harris bathabathe uhambo lwabo kunye nezicaka zam uSidney Rigdon noJoseph Smith, Omnci.
Vumelani izicaka zam uDavid Whitmer noHarvey Whitlock kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo, baze bashumayele endleleni eya kwa kulo mhlaba.
Kwaye vumelani izicaka zam uParley P. Pratt no-Orson Pratt bathabathe uhambo lwabo, baze bashumayele endleleni, nkqu besiya kwa kulo mhlaba.
Kwaye vumelani izicaka zam uSolomon Hancock noSimeon Carter kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo ukuya kwa kulo mhlaba, baze bashumeyele endleleni.
Vumelani izicaka zam uEdson Fuller noJacob Scott kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo.
Vumelani izicaka zam uLevi W. Hancock noZebedee Coltrin kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo.
Vumelani izicaka zam uReynolds Cahoon noSamuel H. Smith kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo.
Vumelani izicaka zam uWheeler Baldwin noWilliam Carter kanjalo bathabathe uhambo lwabo.
Kwaye vumelani izicaka zam uNewel Knight noSelah J. Griffin bobabini bamiselwe, baze bathabathe kanjalo uhambo lwabo.
Ewe, inene ndithi, vumelani bonke aba bathabathe uhambo baye kwindawo enye, kwiindlela zabo eziliqela, kwaye inye indoda ayiyi kwakhela phezu kwesiseko senye, ingayi kuhamba emzileni wenye.
Lowo uthembekileyo, onjalo uya kugcinwa aze asikelelwe ngeziqhamo ezininzi.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndithi kuni, vumelani izicaka zam uJoseph Wakefield noSolomon Humphrey bathabathe uhambo lwabo ukuya kwimihlaba yasempumalanga;

Bavumeleni basebenze kunye neentsapho zabo, babhengeze ngokuthi azikho ezinye izinto kunezo abaprofeti nabapostile bazibonileyo, baza baziva kwaye ngokuqiniseke ngaphezulu kakhulu bazikholelwa, ukuze iziprofetho zibe nokuzalisekiswa.
Kwisiphumo sokukreqa, vumelani oko kwakubekwe phezu koHeman Basset kuthathwe kuye, kuze kubekwe phezu kwentloko kaSimonds Ryder.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani uJared Carter amiselwe abe ngumbingeleli, kananjalo uGeorge James amiselwe abe ngumbingeleli.

Vumelani intsalela yabadala ilunguze phezu kwebandla, ize ibhengeze ilizwi kwiingingqi ezibangqongileyo; kwaye bavumeleni basebenze ngezandla zabo ukuze kungabikho nqulo lwezithixo nankohlakalo yenziwayo.
Kwaye khumbulani ezintweni zonke amahlwempu nabasweleyo, abagulayo nababandezekileyo, kuba lowo ungazenziyo ezi zinto, onjalo akanguye umfundi wam.

Kwaye kwakhona, vumelani izicaka zam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., noSidney Rigdon noEdward Partridge bathabathe kunye nabo iphepha-mvume elivela ebandleni. Kwaye vumelani kubekho elinye kanjalo elifunyanwa sisicaka sam uOliver Cowdery.
Kwaye njalo, nkqu njengoko nditshilo, ukuba nithembekile niya kuhlanganisana kunye nigcobe phezu komhlaba waseMissouri, ongumhlaba welifa lenu, ngoku ingumhlaba weentshaba zenu.
Kodwa, qaphelani, mna, iNkosi ndiya kukhawulezisa isixeko ngexesha laso, kwaye ndiya kubathwesa abathembekileyo ngokugcoba kunye nangokuvuya.
Qaphelani, mna ndinguYesu Krestu, uNyana kaThixo, ndaye ndiya kubanyusela phezulu ngomhla wokugqibela. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ubizo lukaSidney Gilbert nokonyulwa eBandleni amiselwe abe ngumdala; 4–7, Kanjalo asebenze njengearhente kabhishophu.

verses.text: Qaphela, ndithi kuwe, sicaka sam Sidney Gilbert, okokuba ndiyivile imithandazo yakho, kwaye ubize kum okokuba makwenziwe kwazeke kuwe, okweNkosi uThixo wakho, ngokunxulumene nobizo lwakho nokonyulwa ebandleni, mna, iNkosi, endiluphakamisileyo kule mihla yokugqibela.
Qaphela, mna, iNkosi, eyabethelelelwa izono zehlabathi, ndinika wena umyalelo wokuba uya kulilahla ihlabathi.
Thabathela phezu kwakho imimiselo yam, nkqu leyo yomdala, ushumayele ukholo nenguquko noxolelo lwezono, ngokunxulumene nelizwi lam, nokwamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokubeka izandla;
Kananjalo ube yiarhente kweli bandla endaweni oya kuyonyulelwa ngubhishophu, ngokunxulumene nemiyalelo eya kunikwa ukususela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuwe, uya kuthabatha uhambo lwakho nezicaka zam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., noSidney Rigdon.
Qaphela, le yimimiselo yokuqala oya kuyifumana; kwaye intsalela uya kuyenza yaziwe kwixesha elizayo, ngokunxulumene nomsebenzi wakhe esidiliyeni sam.
Kwaye kwakhona, ndinga ungafunda okokuba ngulowo kuphela osindiswayo onyamezela kude kuye esiphelweni. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, AbaNgcwele bamele ukugcina umnqophiso wevangeli ukuzuza inceba; 7–10, Bamele ukuba nomonde ezinkxwalekweni.

verses.text: Qaphela, itsho njalo iNkosi, nkqu uAlfa no-Omega, isiqalo nesiphelo, nkqu lowo wabethelelelwa izono zehlabathi—
Qaphela, inene, inene, ndithi kuwe, sicaka sam Newel Knight, uya kuma nkqi e-ofisini endikonyulele yona.
Kwaye ukuba abazalwana bakho banqwenela ukuphuncula ezintshabeni zabo, bavumele baguquke ezonweni zabo zonke, baze bazithobe ngokwenene phambi kwam kwaye betyumkile.
Kwaye njengomnqophiso abawenza kum abathe bawophula, nkqu kunjalo uthe waphutha kwaye awabinamsebenzi.
Kwaye yeha kulowo esithe esi sikhubekiso seza ngaye, kuba bekuya kuba ngcono kuye ukuba ubethe watshona enzulwini yolwandle.
Kodwa basikelelekile abo bathe bawugcina umnqophiso baza baqwalasela umyalelo, kuba baya kuzuza inceba.
Ngako oko, hamba ngoku kwaye usabe elizweni, hleze iintshaba zakho zize phezu kwakho; uze uthathe uhambo lwakho, uze wonyule lowo uya kumthanda abe yinkokeli yakho, aze akuhlawulele iimali.
Kwaye ngoko uya kuthabatha uhambo lwakho ukuya kwiingingqi zangasentshonalanga, kumhlaba waseMissouri, ukuya kwimida yamaLeymenayithi.
Kwaye emva kokuba ugqibe uhambo, qaphela, ndithi kuwe, funa indlela yokuphila enjengeyabantu, ndide ndikulungiselele indawo.

Kwaye kwakhona, yiba nomonde ezinkxwalekweni ndide ndize; kwaye qaphela, ndiyeza kamsinya, kwaye umvuzo wam ukum, kwaye aba bandifuna kusekutsha baya kufumana ukuphumla emiphefumlweni yabo. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, UWilliam W. Phelps uyabizwa aze akhethe ukuba abhaptizwe, amiselwe abe ngumdala, aze ashumayele ivangeli; 4, Kanjalo abhalele iincwadi abantwana kwizikolo zeBandla; 5–6, Umele ukuhamba aye eMissouri, apho kuya kuba ngummandla wemisebenzi yakhe.

verses.text: Qaphela, itsho njalo iNkosi kuwe, sicaka sam William, ewe, nkqu iNkosi yomhlaba wonke, wena ubizwe waza wakhethwa; kwaye emva kokuba ubhaptizwe ngamanzi, ukuba oko ukwenza ngeliso elinikele kuzuko lwam, uya kufumana uxolelo lwezono zakho nokwamkela uMoya oyiNgcwele ngokubekwa izandla;

Kwaye ngoko uya kumiselwa ngesandla sesicaka sam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., ube ngumdala kweli bandla, ushumayele inguquko noxolelo lwezono ngendlela yobhaptizo egameni likaYesu Krestu, uNyana kaThixo ophilileyo.
Kwaye nabanina oya kubeka izandla zakho kubo, ukuba batyumkile phambi kwam, uya kuba namandla okunika uMoya oyiNgcwele.

Kwaye kwakhona, uya kumiselwa uncedise isicaka sam uOliver Cowdery ekwenzeni umsebenzi wokushicilela, nowokukhetha nokubhalela iincwadi izikolo kweli bandla, ukuze abantwana abancinane kanjalo babe nokufumana umyalelo phambi kwam njengoko kukholekile kum.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, ngenxa yesi sizathu uya kuthabatha uhambo kunye nezicaka zam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., noSidney Rigdon, ukuze ube nokutyalwa emhlabeni welifa lakho wenze lo msebenzi.
Kwaye kwakhona, vumela isicaka sam uJoseph Coe kanjalo athabathe uhambo lwakhe kunye nabo. Intsalela iya kwenziwa yaziwe ukususela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo, nkqu njengoko ndiya kuthanda. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 56
chapter_summary: 1–2, AbaNgcwele bamele ukuthabatha iminqamlezo yabo baze balandele iNkosi ukuzuza usindiso; 3–13, INkosi iyayalela kwaye irhoxise, kwaye abangathobeliyo baphoselwa ngaphandle; 14–17, Yeha kwabo bazizityebi abangayi kunceda amahlwempu, kwaye yeha kwabo bangamahlwempu abaneentliziyo ezingophukanga; 18–20, Basikelelekile abangamahlwempu abahlambulukileyo intliziyo, ngokuba baya kuwudla ilifa umhlaba.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu nina bantu babhengeza igama lam, itsho iNkosi uThixo wenu; kuba qaphelani, umsindo wam uphenjiwe ngokuchasene nabavukelayo, kwaye baya kuyazi ingalo yam nengqumbo yam, ngomhla wokundwendwela nowomsindo phezu kwezizwe.
Kwaye lowo ungazi kuwuthabatha umnqamlezo wakhe aze andilandele, aze agcine imiyalelo yam, onjalo akayi kusindiswa.
Qaphelani, mna, iNkosi, ndiyayalela; kwaye lowo ungayi kuthobela uya kukhutshelwa ngaphandle ngexesha lam elifanelekileyo, emva kokuba ndiyalele waza umyalelo wophulwa.
Ngako oko, mna iNkosi ndiyayalela ndize ndirhoxise, njengoko kubonakala kulungile kum, kwaye konke oku kuya kuphendulwa phezu kweentloko zabavukelayo, itsho iNkosi.

Ngako oko, ndirhoxisa umyalelo owawunikwe izicaka zam uThomas B. Marsh noEzra Thayre, ndize ndinike umyalelo omtsha kwisicaka sam uThomas, wokokuba uya kuthabatha uhambo olungxamisekileyo ukuya kumhlaba waseMissouri, waye isicaka sam uSelah J. Griffin kanjalo uya kuhamba naye.
Kuba qaphelani, ndirhoxise umyalelo owawunikwe izicaka zam uSelah J. Griffin noNewel Knight, ngezizathu zokuqina kweentamo zabantu bam abaseThompson, nokuvukela kwabo.
Ngako oko, vumelani isicaka sam uNewel Knight asale nabo; kwaye njengokuba beya kubabaninzi abaya kuhamba mabahambe, abo batyumkileyo phambi kwam baze bakhokelwe nguye ukuya kwilizwe endilinyulileyo.

Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, okokuba isicaka sam uEzra Thayre umele ukuguquka ekratshini lakhe, nasekuzicingeleni isiqu sakhe, aze athobele umyalelo ongaphambili ebendimnike wona ngokunxulumene nendawo ahlala kuyo.
Kwaye ukuba uya kwenza oku, njengokuba kungayi kubakho zahlulo zenziwayo emhlabeni, uya konyulelwa abe usaya kumhlaba waseMissouri;
Ngenye indlela uya kufumana imali ayihlawuleyo, kwaye uya kuyishiya indawo, kwaye uya kukhutshelwa ngaphandle kwebandla lam, itsho iNkosi uThixo wemikhosi;
Kwaye nangona izulu nomhlaba zidlula, la mazwi akayi kudlula, kodwa aya kuzalisekiswa.

Kwaye ukuba isicaka sam uJoseph Smith, Omnci., unyanzeleke ahlawule imali, qaphelani, mna, iNkosi, ndiya kuyihlawula kuye kwakhona kumhlaba waseMissouri, ukuze ababo aya kubafumana babe nokuvuzwa kwakhona ngokunxulumene noko bakwenzayo;
Kuba ngokunxulumene noko bakwenzayo baya kufumana, nkqu kwimihlaba yelifa labo.

Qaphelani, itsho njalo iNkosi ebantwini bam—ninezinto emanizenze nemaniziguqukele; kuba qaphelani, izono zenu zinyukele phezulu kum, kwaye azixolelwanga, ngenxa yokuba nifuna ukucebisa ngeendlela ezizezenu.
Kwaye iintliziyo zenu azonelisekanga. Kwaye aniyithobeli inyaniso, kodwa ninovuyo koko kungebubo ubulungisa.

Yeha kuni bantu bazizityebi, eningayi kunikela ngezinto zenu emahlwempini, kuba ubutyebi benu buya kubolisa imiphefumlo yenu; kwaye oku kuya kuba sisililo senu ngemini yovelelo, neyomgwebo, neyengqumbo: Ukuvuma kudlulile, ihlobo liphelile, kwaye umphefumlo wam awusindiswanga!

Yeha kuni bantu bangamahlwempu, abantliziyo zingaphukanga, abamimoya ingatyumkanga, nabazisu zingonelisekanga, nabazandla zingathintelwanga ekuthabatheni izinto zabanye abantu, abamehlo azaliswe kukunyoluka, nabo bangayi kusebenza ngezandla zabo!

Kodwa basikelelekile abangamahlwempu abahlambulukileyo intliziyo, abantliziyo zophukileyo, nabamimoya ityumkileyo, kuba baya kububona ubukumkani bukaThixo busiza emandleni nakubuqaqawuli obukhulu kuhlangulo lwabo kuba ukutyeba komhlaba kuya kuba kokwabo.
Kuba qaphelani, iNkosi iya kuza, kwaye umvuzo wayo uya kuba nayo, kwaye iya kuvuza wonke umntu, kwaye amahlwempu aya kugcoba;
Kwaye izizukulwana ziya kuwudla ilifa umhlaba ukususela kwisizukulwana ukuya kwisizukulwana, ngonaphakade kanaphakade. Kwaye ngoku ndenze isiphelo sokuthetha nani. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, I-Independence, eMissouri, yindawo yeSixeko iZiyon netempile; 4–7, AbaNgcwele bamele ukuthenga imihlaba baze bafumane amafa kuloo mmandla; 8–16, USidney Gilbert umele ukuseka ivenkile, uWilliam W. Phelps uza kuba ngumshicileli, aze uOliver Cowdery abe ngumhleli wemibhalo elungiselelwe upapasho.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu nina badala bebandla lam, itsho iNkosi uThixo, onihlanganise kunye, ngokunxulumene nemiyalelo yam, kulo mhlaba waseMissouri, ongumhlaba endiwonyulele ndawungcwalisela ukuhlanganisela abangcwele.
Ngako oko, lo ngumhlaba wesithembiso, nendawo yesixeko seZiyon.

Kuba itsho njalo iNkosi uThixo wenu, ukuba niya kufumana ubulumko nabu ubulumko. Qaphelani, indawo ngoku ebizwa i-Independence iyindawo engumbindi; kwaye iyindawo yetempile elele ngasentshonalanga, ngaphezu kwesiza esingekude ukusuka kwindlu yamatyala.
Ngako oko, kububulumko ukuba umhlaba uthengwe ngabangcwele, kananjalo wonke ummandla olelele ngasentshonalanga, nkqu ukuya emgceni obaleka ngokuthe ngqo phakathi kwamaYuda neeNtlanga;
Kananjalo wonke ummandla owenza imida ngamathafakazi, kangangoko abafundi bam beya kubanako ukuthenga imihlaba. Qaphelani, obu bubulumko, ukuze babe nokuyizuzela ilifa lanaphakade.

Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uSidney Gilbert eme kwiofisi endimonyulele yona, amkele iimali, abe yiarhente ebandleni, athenge umhlaba kuzo zonke iingingqi ezingqongileyo, njengokuba enako ukwenza ebulungiseni, kwaye njengoko ubulumko buya kumkhokela.
Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uEdward Partridge eme kwiofisi endimonyulele yona, aze ohlulele abangcwele ilifa labo, nkqu njengoko ndiyaleleyo; kananjalo abo abonyulele ukumncedisa.

Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani isicaka sam uSidney Gilbert azityale kule ndawo, aze aseke ivenkile, aze abe nokuthengisa iimpahla ngaphandle kobuqhinga, ukuze abe nokuzuza imali yokuthenga imihlaba ngokufanele abangcwele, aze abe nokuzuza naziphi na izinto abafundi abanokuzifuna ukubatyala elifeni labo.

Kananjalo vumelani isicaka sam u Sidney Gilbert azuze imvume—qaphelani obu bubulumko, kwaye nabani na ofundayo menzeni aqonde—ukuze abe nokuthumela iimpahla kanjalo ebantwini, nkqu ngalowo uya kuqashwa njengonobhala emsebenzini wakhe;
Kwaye ngoko bonelani abangcwele bam, ukuze ivangeli yam ibe nokushunyayelwa kubo abo bahleli emnyameni nakwingingqi nethunzi lokufa.
Kwaye kwakhona, inene ndithi kuni, vumelani isicaka sam uWilliam W. Phelps sityalwe kule ndawo, size senziwe sibe ngumshicileleli webandla.
Kwaye yabonani, ukuba ihlabathi aliyamkeli imibono yakhe—qaphelani nabu ubulumko—mvumeleni azuze nantoni na anako ukuyizuza ngobulungisa, ngokufanele abangcwele.

Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uOliver Cowdery amncedise, nkqu njengoko ndiniyalileyo, nakuyiphi na indawo endiya kumnyulela kuyo, akope, aze alungise, aze akhethe, ukuze zonke izinto zibe nokulunga phambi kwam, njengoko kuya kuqinisekiswa nguMoya ngaye.
Kwaye ngoko vumelani abo babo endithe mabatyalwe emhlabeni weZiyon, ngokukhawuleza okunokwenzeka, kunye neentsapho zabo, benze ezo zinto nkqu njengoko ndithethileyo.
Kwaye ngoku ngokunxulumene nokuhlanganisela—Vumelani ubhishophu nearhente benze amalungiselelo ezoo ntsapho ziyalelwe ukuba ziza kulo mhlaba, ngokukhawuleza, aze azityale elifeni lazo.
Nakwintsalela yabadala kunye namalungu izikhokelo ezizezinye ziya kunikwa ukususela ngoku nakwixesha elizayo. Nkqu kunjalo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Abo banyamezela iinkxwaleko baya kuthweswa ngozuko; 6–12, AbaNgcwele mabalungiselele umsitho weMvana nesidlo somsitho weNkosi; 13–18, Oobhishophu ngabagwebi bakwaSirayeli; 19–23, AbaNgcwele mabathobele imithetho yelizwe; 24–29, Abantu mabasebenzise igunya labo lokuzikhethela ekwenzeni okulungileyo; 30–33, INkosi iyayalela ize irhoxise; 34–43, Ekuguqukeni, abantu bamele ukuvuma nokulahla izono zabo; 44–58, AbaNgcwele mabathenge ilifa labo baze bahlanganisane eMissouri; 59–65, Ivangeli imele ukushunyayelwa kuzo zonke izidalwa.

verses.text: Phulaphulani, Owu nina badala bebandla lam, nize nibazele indlebe ilizwi lam, nize nifunde kum oko intando yam ikunxulumanise nani, kananjalo kunxulumene neli lizwe endithe ndanithumela kulo.
Kuba inene ndithi kuni, unoyolo lowo uyigcinayo imiyalelo yam, nokokuba kusebomini okanye ekufeni; kwaye lowo uthembekileyo kwiinkxwaleko, umvuzo wonjalo mkhulu ngakumbi ebukumkanini bezulu.
Aninako ukuqaphela ngamehlo enu endalo, okwa kaloku nje, icebo loThixo wenu ngokunxulumene nezo zinto eziya kuza emva koku, nozuko oluya kulandela emva kwenkxwaleko enkulu.
Kuba emva kwenkxwaleko enkulu kuza iintsikelelo. Ngako oko umhla uyeza eniya kuthweswa ngozuko olukhulu; alikafiki ilixa, kodwa ihlobo selikufuphi.
Khumbulani oku, ebendinixelele ngaphambili, okokuba ningakubeka entliziyweni, nize nizuze oko kuya kulandela.
Qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, ngesi sizathu ndinithumele—okokuba nithobeke, nokokuba iintliziyo zenu zibe nokulungiselela ukunika ubungqina bezinto ezisezayo;
Kananjalo ibe nokuhlonitshwa ekubekeni isiseko, nasekunikeni imbali yelizwe apho iZiyon kaThixo iya kuma khona;

Kananjalo okokuba isidlo sezinto ezityebileyo zibe nokulungiselelwa amahlwempu; ewe, isidlo sezinto ezityebileyo, sewayini egcinwe ngeentsipho, okokuba umhlaba ube nokukwazi ukuba imilomo yabaprofeti ayisayi kusilela;
Ewe, isidlo sendlu yeNkosi, esilungiswe kakuhle, apho kuzo zonke izizwe ziya kumenyelwa.
Okokuqala, abazizityebi nabafundileyo, abalumkileyo nabandilisekileyo;
Kwaye emva koko kuya kuza loo mini yamandla am; ngoko amahlwempu, iziqhwala, neemfama, nezithulu, ziya kuza emsithweni weMvana, zidle isidlo seNkosi, esilungiselelwe loo mini inkulu izayo.
Qaphelani, mna, iNkosi, nditshilo.
Nokuba ubungqina buya kuhamba buvela eZiyon, ewe, emlonyeni wesixeko selifa likaThixo—
Ewe, ngesi sizathu ndinizise apha, kwaye ndisonyule isicaka sam uEdward Partridge, ndaze ndamisela kuye umsebenzi wakhe kweli lizwe.
Kodwa ukuba akaguquki ezonweni zakhe, ezikukungakholelwa nobumfama bentliziyo, makalumke hleze awe.
Qaphelani umsebenzi wakhe unikwe yena, kwaye awuyi kunikwa kwakhona.
Kwaye lowo umi kulo msebenzi umiswe ukuba abe ngumgwebi kwaSirayeli, njengoko kwakunjalo kwimihla yamandulo, ekwahluleni amazwe elifa likaThixo kubantwana bakhe;
Nokugweba abantu bakhe ngobungqina bamalungisa, nangoncedo lwabacebisi bakhe, ngokunxulumene nemithetho yobukumkani enikwe ngabaprofeti bakaThixo.
Kuba inene ndithi kuni, umthetho wam uya kugcinwa kweli lizwe.

Makungabikho mntu ucinga ukuba ungumlawuli; kodwa makuyekwe uThixo amlawule lowo ugwebayo, ngokunxulumene necebiso lentando yakhe, okanye, ngamanye amazwi, lowo ucebisayo okanye uhleli phezu kwesihlalo sokugweba.
Makungabikho mntu waphula imithetho yelizwe, kuba lowo uyigcinayo imithetho kaThixo akukho mfuneko yokwaphula imithetho yelizwe.
Ngako oko, thobelani amandla akhoyo, ade alawule lowo ililungelo lakhe ukulawula, kwaye oyisele zonke iintshaba phantsi kweenyawo zakhe.
Qaphelani, imithetho enithe nayifumana evela esandleni sam yimithetho yebandla, kwaye koku kukhanya niya kuyibamba. Qaphelani, nabu ubulumko.

Kwaye ngoku, njengoko ndathetha ngokunxulumene nesicaka sam uEdward Partridge, eli lizwe lilizwe lokuhlala kwakhe, kwanabo athe wabonyulela ukuba ngabacebisi bakhe; kananjalo ilizwe lokuhlala lalowo endithe ndamnyula ukuba agcine uvimba wam;
Ngako oko, mabazise iintsapho zabo kweli lizwe, njengoko beya kucebisana phakathi kwabo kunye nam.
Kuba qaphelani, akufanelekanga ukuba ndiyalele kuzo zonke izinto; kuba lowo unyanzelwayo kwizinto zonke, onjalo ulivila aze angabi sisicaka esilumkileyo; ngako oko akafumani mvuzo.
Inene ndithi, abantu mabaxhinele ukuzinikela kwinjongo elungileyo, baze benze izinto ezininzi ngokwentando yabo ekhululekileyo, baze bazise ubulungisa obungakumbi;
Kuba amandla akubo, apho baziarhente zeziqu zabo. Kwaye njengokuba abantu besenza okulungileyo abasayi kuphulukana nomvuzo wabo nangayiphina indlela.
Kodwa lowo ungenzi nayiphina into kude kube uyayalelwa, aze afumane umyalelo ngentliziyo ethandabuzayo, aze awugcine ngobuvila, onjalo ugwetyiwe.
Ndingubani mna lowo wenze umntu, itsho iNkosi, uya kumenza angabi natyala lowo ungayithobeliyo imiyalelo yam?
Ndingubani mna, itsho iNkosi, othe wathembisa waze akazalisekisa?
Ndiyayalela baze abantu bangathobeli; ndiyarhoxisa kwaye bangafumani ntsikelelo.
Ngoko bathi ezintliziyweni zabo: Lo asinguwo umsebenzi weNkosi, kuba izithembiso zayo azizalisekanga. Kodwa yeha kwabo, kuba umvuzo wabo ugoxile ngaphantsi, kwaye awuveli ngasentla.
Kwaye ngoku ndinika nina izikhokelo eziqhubekekayo ngokunxulumene neli lizwe.
Bubulumko obukum bokokuba isicaka sam uMartin Harris abe ngumzekelo kulo ibandla, azise iimali zakhe phambi kwebhishophu yebandla.
Kananjalo, lo ngumthetho kuye wonke umntu oza kweli lizwe ukuze afumane ilifa; kwaye uya kwenza ngeemali zakhe njengoko umthetho ukhokela.
Kwaye bubulumko kanjalo okokuba kumele kubekho imihlaba ethengwe eIndependence, eyiyeyendawo kavimba, kananjalo neyendlu yokushicilela.
Kwaye ezinye izikhokelo ngokunxulumene nesicaka sam uMartin Harris ziya kunikwa yena ngokoMoya, okukuba abe nokufumana ilifa lakhe njengokubonwa elungile;
Kwaye makaguquke ezonweni zakhe, kuba uzungula ukunconywa lihlabathi.
Kananjalo yenzani isicaka sam uWilliam W. Phelps eme kwiofisi endimnyulele yona, aze afumane ilifa lakhe elizweni;
Kananjalo ufanele ukuguquka, kuba mna, iNkosi, andanelisekanga nguye, kuba ufuna ukuvelela, kwaye akalulamanga ngokwaneleyo phambi kwam.
Qaphelani, lowo uthe waguquka ezonweni zakhe, onjalo uxolelwe, kwaye mna, iNkosi, andizikhumbuli kwakhona.
Ngoko ke ninokwazi ukuba umntu uguqukile ezonweni zakhe—qaphelani, uya kuzivuma aze azilahle.

Kwaye ngoku, inene, ndithi ngokunxulumene nentsalela yabadala bebandla lam, ixesha alikafiki, kuba yiminyaka emininzi, ukuze bona bafumane ilifa labo kweli lizwe, ngaphandle kokuba bayafuna ngomthandazo wokholo, kuphela njengoko liya kunyulelwa kubo ngokweNkosi.
Kuba, qaphelani, baya kuhlanganisela abantu kunye ukususela kwiziphelo zomhlaba.
Ngako oko, zihlanganiseni kunye; baze abo bangonyulwanga bahlale kweli lizwe, nibayeke bashumayele ivangeli kwiingingqi eziningqongileyo; kwaye emva koko nibavumele babuyele emakhayeni abo.
Bavumeleni bashumayele ngendlela, baze benze ubungqina benyaniso kuzo zonke iindawo, baze babize izityebi, abaphakamileyo nabathobekileyo, nabangamahlwempu baguquke.
Kwaye nibavumele bakhe amabandla, njengokuba abemi bomhlaba beya kuguquka.
Kwaye vumelani kubekho iarhente eyonyulwe ngelizwi lebandla, ngalo ibandla eOhio, ukufumana iimali zokuthenga imihlaba eZiyon.
Kwaye ndinika isicaka sam uSidney Rigdon umyalelo, wokokuba uya kubhala inkcazo yomhlaba weZiyon, nengxelo yentando kaThixo, njengoko iya kwenziwa ukuba yaziwe nguMoya kuye;

Kwaye ileta nomrhumo, maziziswe kuwo onke amabandla ukuzuza iimali, zokubekwa ezandleni zikabhishophu, ngokwakhe okanye iarhente, njengokuba kubonakala kulungile kuye okanye njengoko eya kukhokela, ekuthengeni imihlaba ngokwelifa labantwana bakaThixo.

Kuba, qaphelani, inene ndithi kuni, iNkosi ithanda okokuba abafundi nabantwana babantu mabavule iintliziyo zabo, nkqu ekuthengeni le ngingqi ipheleleyo yelizwe, ngokukhawuleza njengokuba ixesha liya kuvuma.
Qaphelani, nabu ubulumko. Bavumeleni benze oku hleze bangazuzi naliphina ilifa, ngaphandle kokuba kube kungokuphalazwa kwegazi.
Kwaye kwakhona, njengokuba kwakukho umhlaba abawufumeneyo, makubekho amadoda okusebenza athunyelwayo eendidi zonke kweli lizwe, asebenzele abangcwele bakaThixo.
Mazenzeke zonke ezi zinto ngocwangco; kwaye kwenziwe amalungelo awodwa emihlaba aziwe amaxesha ngamaxesha, ngubhishophu okanye iarhente yebandla.
Kwaye vumelani umsebenzi wokuhlanganiswa ungangxanyisiswa, nangokusaba; kodwa mayenziwe njengoko iya kucetyiswa ngabadala bebandla kwiinkomfa, ngokunxulumene kulwazi abalufumana amaxesha ngamaxesha.
Kwaye vumelani isicaka sam uSidney Rigdon athambise aze abingelelele eli lizwe, nendawo yetempile, eNkosini.

Kwaye vumelani intlanganiso yenkomfa ibizwe; kwaye emva koko vumelani izicaka zam uSidney Rigdon noJoseph Smith, Omnci., babuye, kananjalo uOliver Cowdery kunye nabo, baphumelelise intsalela yomsebenzi endithe ndawonyulela bona elizweni elilelabo, nentsalela njengokuba iya kulawulwa ziinkomfa.
Kwaye ningavumeli mntu abuyele kweli lizwe ngaphandle kokuba unike ubungqina apha endleleni, boko akwaziyo kwaye akholelwa eqiniseke ngokugqithisileyo ngako.

Vumelani oko kuthe kwanikelwa kuZiba Peterson kuthatyathwe kuye; nimvumele eme njengelungu ebandleni, aze asebenze ngezandla zakhe, kunye nabazalwana, kude kube uqeqeshwe ngokwaneleyo ngezono zakhe zonke; kuba akazivumanga, kwaye ucinga ukuzifihla.
Vumelani intsalela yabadala beli bandla, abeza kweli lizwe, abanye babo abasikelelwe ngokugqithisileyo kwanangaphaya komlinganiselo, kanjalo babambe inkomfa phezu kweli lizwe.
Kwaye nivumele isicaka sam uEdward Partridge akhokele inkomfa eya kubanjwa ngabo.
Kananjalo bavumeleni babuye, beshumayela ivangeli endleleni, benika ubungqina bezinto ezityhiliweyo kubo.

Kuba, inene, isandi masihambele phambili ukusuka kule ndawo ukuya kulo lonke ihlabathi, kwaye kuzo iindawo ezikude zomhlaba—ivangeli mayishunyayelwe kuzo zonke izidalwa, belandelwa yimiqondiso yabo bakholwayo.
Kwaye qaphelani uNyana woMntu uyeza. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, AbaNgcwele eZiyon abathembekileyo baya kusikelelwa; 5–8, Bamele ukuthanda nokukhonza iNkosi kwaye bagcine imiyalelo; 9–19, Ngokugcina umhla weNkosi ungcwele, abaNgcwele bayasikelelwa ngokwasenyameni nasemoyeni; 20–24, Amalungisa athenjiswa uxolo kweli hlabathi nobomi obungunaphakade kwihlabathi elizayo.

verses.text: Qaphela, banoyolo, itsho iNkosi, abathe benyukela kweli lizwe ngeliso elijonge kuphela kuzuko lwam, ngokunxulumene nemiyalelo yam.

Kuba abo baphilayo baya kudla ilifa umhlaba, kwaye nabo bafayo baya kuphumla kwimisebenzi yabo, kwaye nemisebenzi yabo iya kubalandela; kwaye baya kuzuza isithsaba endlwini kaBawo eneendawo ezininzi, endithe ndabalungiselela yona.
Ewe, banoyolo abo banyawo zabo zimi phezu kwelizwe laseZiyon, abathe bathobela ivangeli yam; kuba baya kuzuza ngokomvuzo wabo izinto ezilungileyo zomhlaba, kwaye uya kuzisa ngokwamandla wawo.
Kananjalo baya kuthweswa ngeentsikelelo ezivela phezulu, ewe, nakwakunye nemiyalelo engembalwa, nakwakunye nezityhilelo ngexesha labo—abo banyanisekileyo kwaye bekhuthele phambi kwam.
Ngako oko, ndibanika umyalelo, ndisithi ngolu hlobo: Uze uyithande iNkosi uThixo wakho ngentliziyo yakho iphela, ngamandla akho onke, ngengqondo, nokomelela; nasegameni likaYesu Krestu uze umkhonze.
Uze umthande ummelwane wakho njengokuba uzithanda. Uze ungebi; ungakrexezi, nakubulala, nakwenza nayiphina into enjalo.
Uze uyibulele iNkosi uThixo wakho ezintweni zonke.
Uze unikele umbingelelo kwiNkosi uThixo wakho ngobulungisa, nangako oko kwentliziyo eyaphukileyo nomoya otyumkileyo.
Nokokuba uze uzigcine ngokupheleleyo ngakumbi ungenachaphaza ehlabathini, uze uye endlwini yokuthandaza uze unyusele imithendeleko yakho ngomhla wam ongcwele;
Kuba inene lo ngumhla obekelwe wena ukuba uphumle emisebenzini yakho, kwaye unikele imithandazo yakho koseNyangweni:
Nangona kunjalo izifungo zakho ziya kunikelwa phezulu ngobulungisa yonke imihla nangamaxesha onke;
Kodwa khumbula okokuba ngalo mhla, umhla weNkosi, uya kunikela ngeminikelo yakho nemithendeleko koseNyangweni, uvuma izono zakho kubazalwana bakho, naphambi kweNkosi.
Kwaye ngalo mhla uze ungenzi nanye enye into, kuphela yenza ukudla kwakho kulungiswe ngentliziyo enye ukuze inzila yakho ibe nokugqibelela, okanye, ngamanye amazwi, ukuze ukugcoba kwakho kugqibelele.
Inene, le yinzila nomthandazo, okanye ngamanye amazwi, kukugcoba nomthandazo.

Kwaye njengokuba nizenza ezi zinto ngombulelo, ngeentliziyo ezichwayitileyo neembonakalo, ingabi kukugigitheka okungakumbi, kuba oku kusisono, kodwa ngentliziyo eyonwabileyo nembonakalo echwayitileyo—
Inene ndithi, njengokuba nikwenza oku, inzaliseko yomhlaba yeyenu, amarhamncwa asendle neentaka zezulu, nezo zikhwela phezu kwemithi nezihamba phezu komhlaba;
Ewe, nemifuno, nezinto ezilungileyo ezivela emhlabeni, nokokuba zezokutya okanye zezokunxiba, okanye zezezindlu, okanye zezoovimba, okanye zezezitiya zeziqhamo, okanye zezitiya, okanye zezezidiliya;
Ewe, zonke izinto ezivela emhlabeni, ngexesha lazo, zenzelwe inzuzo nokusetyenziswa ngabantu, kunye zikholise iliso nokonwabisa intliziyo;
Ewe, ukutya nokunxiba, incasa nokujoja, ukomeleza umzimba nokuvuselela umphefumlo.
Kwaye kuyamkholisa uThixo ukuba ethe wazinika abantu zonke ezi zinto; kuba zazenzelwe oku, ngokuziqikelelela, ingabi kukungazeyisi, ingabi kukuphanga.

Kwaye akukho nto umntu athi akhathaze uThixo ngayo, okanye akukho nanye into enokuphembelela umsindo wakhe, ngaphandle kwabo bangasivumiyo isandla sakhe kwizinto zonke, baze bangayithobeli imiyalelo yakhe.
Qaphelani, oku kunxulumene nomthetho nabaprofeti; ngako oko, ungandikhathazi kwakhona ngokunxulumene nalo mba.
Kodwa funda okokuba lowo wenza imisebenzi yobulungisa uya kuzuza umvuzo wakhe, kwanoxolo kweli hlabathi, nobomi obungunaphakade kwihlabathi elizayo.
Mna, iNkosi, nditshilo, noMoya unika ubungqina. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: IMfundiso neMinqophiso 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, Abadala bamele ukushumayela ivangeli kwiintlanga zabakhohlakeleyo; 10–14, Abamele ukulichitha ngobuvila ixesha labo, nakungcwaba iitalente zabo; 15–17, Banokuhlamba iinyawo zabo njengobungqina ngokuchasene nabo baya kuyala ivangeli.
